name: Half-Life ZDoom
description: Sin descripción

name: Repunk
description:
Repunk is a single player immersive sim with permadeath... and writing.

Explore. Scavenge. Create. Survive.
Live a unique adventure from an old overland train.

Welcome to an alternative universe, where Mars was colonized... in 1939.

name: DNF Duel: DLC 1 - Spectre
description:
'Spectre' can be used in DNF Duel.

Spectre is the first character in the DNF Duel: Season Pass and was released alongside a major balance patch and gameplay update that added new systems to the game.

name: Trapped Girl X
description:
This is a new world that is a drastic rearrangement of the previous "Trapped Girls".
Solve the riddles in the mansion and rescue more girls.

name: Koro-koro Reimu
description: The first side-scrolling action game in which tiny Reimu rolls around with 8-bit sounds.

name: DNF Duel: Season Pass
description:
The Season Pass for DNF Duel is set to have 5 characters released by the end of 2024, each character will also be available separately.

The characters included are Spectre, Brawler, Battle Mage, Monk and a 5th to be revealed later.

name: The Little Mermaid
description: The Little Mermaid was a browser game by McDonald's that was only playable on mobile devices. The game was based on the 2023 movie of the same name and was made to promote the Happy Meal campaign based on it.

name: Contenders: Arena
description: As a player, you take on the role of a pilot, and compete in a futuristic gameshow that pits mind-controlled robots - known as Gladiators - against each other in adrenaline-fueled matches, televised within the extended Contenders universe.

name: Magic Tower Hero: DungeonKing
description: Magic Tower Hero features rogue-like adventure with real-time multiplayer battles.

name: Fetish Locator
description: Play as a young college student exploring love, lust, and sexual fetishes with the hottest women in town. Score points in the Fetish Locator app, which has taken the campus by storm. Make choices and decide the fate of the story in Fetish Locator!

name: Sniper Elite 5: Rough Landing - Mission and Weapon Pack
description: Season Pass Two kicks off with the release of an amazing new mission called Rough Landing. Allied airmen, including a high-ranking officer with critical intelligence, have been shot down over a dense woodland and are now being hunted by Nazi troops. Karl’s mission is to find the hidden pilots and retrieve the intelligence. Set deep in a forest and featuring a cramped mine shaft, expect plenty of close quarters combat which will test your skills.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Kraken Awakes - Mission, Weapon and Skin Pack
description:
The final content drop for Season Pass Two delivers an incredible new mission called Kraken Awakes that brings the story of Sniper Elite 5 to a close. Shocking new Intel suggests that Project Kraken is still very much alive, and parts are being shipped to a military dock. It’s now down to you to put an end to Kraken once and for all.
Based around an advanced aircraft carrier that is currently under construction, Karl will have to infiltrate the carrier under the cover of darkness, to stop its deployment as well as putting an end to Friedrich Vogel, who is now spearheading the project.

name: Atomic Heart: Annihilation Instinct
description: Continue the story in the Annihilation Instinct DLC and learn what happened to this dystopian world after the climax of Atomic Heart. Prepare to embark on a journey through the new mind-bending Mendeleev Complex and its surrounding swamps, and discover the truth about NORA as Major P-3 is pulled back into Facility 3826. Survive vicious, shape-shifting new enemies and take them down using two cunning new weapons - ranged one the Secateur and melee one the Klusha - as well as your glove’s new Techno-Stasis ability, allowing you to manipulate time itself. Meet a new enigmatic character, as well as returning ones in surprising circumstances and dive deep into the AI’s insanity to curb its Annihilation Instinct.

name: Mannequin The Spotting
description: Prepare to re-enter a chilling world where malevolent mannequins lurk in the shadows, waiting to strike. In this horror game, your survival hinges on your ability to navigate an environment infested with these eerie figures. Utilize the security cameras to discern the evil ones from their benign counterparts, but beware, for one wrong move could lead to your untimely demise.

name: The Joy of Creation: Classic
description: The Joy of Creation: Classic was a point and click survival horror video game that was being remade from the ground up for the Fazbear Fanverse, Including new assets, new gameplay, new everything.

name: The Joy of Creation: Reborn
description: The Joy of Creation: Reborn was a free-roam survival horror video game that was being remade from the ground up for the Fazbear Fanverse, Including new assets, new gameplay, new everything.

name: The Joy of Creation: Story Mode
description: The Joy of Creation: Story Mode was a point-and-click survival horror video game and was being remade from the ground up for the Fazbear Fanverse, Including new assets, new gameplay, new everything.

name: King's Son
description: The King's son, whose kingdom has been taken from him, wants his kingdom back

name: Professional Fishing 2
description: "Professional Fishing 2" is the second installment of an exciting fishing game that takes you into the world of thrilling angling adventures. Step into the shoes of a novice angler, embarking on a journey with simple yet reliable gear.

name: Play Chess with Lady Bongcloud
description: "Play Chess with Lady Bongcloud" is an unique chess game that allows you to engage in thrilling chess matches with the Lady Bongcloud. The lady hails from the noble Bongcloud family, renowned for their unique "Bongcloud Opening".

name: American Eristics
description: Would you believe one of your friends is a killer? Return home in this 2.5D horror story.

name: Trigger Tennis
description: Trigger Tennis is a third person shooter with tennis elements where rackets are swoped for guns and tennis balls for bullets

name: The Experiment
description: The tests went wrong. He has been transformed. It is hostile toward others. You have been assigned the task of killing the horrifying creature. Listen closely as it could be around any corner.

name: Endless Suburbia
description: A hyper-realistic horror driving game set in a suburban environment. Drive through six different atmospheric experiences where an alien invasion, spider infestation, murderous mime, and other frightful events will happen.

name: Idle Industries
description: Idle Industries: Build, Prestige, Prosper! Unleash miners, refine resources, and construct your empire in this addictive factory-building sim. Reach new heights of wealth and prestige with doubled rewards. Original music, 20+ hours gameplay, and customization!

name: Heart of Mobius
description: Dive into a captivating standalone story in just an hour! Presenting the first installment of the "Handy Novel" series. Highly praised on smartphones, this acclaimed narrative is now ready for your enjoyment on Steam for PC/Mac!

name: I Have a Dream
description: I HAVE A DREAM is a 3D puzzle line game. You wake up in a place you've never seen before. Adapt to the transformation of various points of view and get out of here!

name: Cute Animals and Heavy Guns
description: "Cute Animals and Heavy Guns" is a fast-paced shooter where you play as cute animals get ready to fight the zombie apocalypse!

name: Cats Hidden in Paris: Extra Level
description: Play a brand new level enriched with intricate details, vividly illustrating the mesmerizing city of love! 100 Cats have once again decided to hide themselves but this time it will prove to be a much greater challenge to find them all!

name: StoryMode.Online
description:
A Hilarious Multiplayer Collaborative Storytelling Adventure!

Step into the roles of both writers and choosers to shape the narrative in each round. As a writer, you'll submit your most ingenious phrases, hoping to impress the chooser. If your phrase is chosen, you earn a point and it becomes an integral part of the evolving story. The power to select the winning phrase lies in the hands of the chooser, so choose wisely and watch the tale unfold!

The journey continues until a writer reaches the score limit, emerging as the victorious storyteller. Let your creativity soar and outshine your opponents to claim this prestigious title!

name: Let's Study Japanese: A Sexy and Fun Way to Learn Japanese - Vol. 1
description: Are you ready to experience a fresh new approach to learning Japanese? Introducing "Let's Study Japanese," an app that utilizes slightly naughty illustrations to make learning Japanese more enjoyable, engaging, and easier to remember.

name: Crossroad of Worlds: Magic Stars - Collector's Edition
description: Uncle Randall of his investigative agency and the Guardian of Worlds appeal for your support in another plea for help - someone has once again encroached on the stars of magical worlds!

name: Ghetto Zombies
description: Ghetto Zombies is a pixel art action-packed shooter where you must defend the ghetto in a post-apocalyptic world full of zombies. As one of the heroes from the "Ghetto Zombies Squad", you must build new and crazy weapons such as the bubble gum bazooka, paint the city walls with colorful graffiti, and slay the zombies with no mercy!

name: The Horror Within
description: A short indie horror game with puzzle elements where you're playing a horror game inside the game.

name: Mr. Wings
description: Mr. Wings is an upcoming adventure platformer from linearharu which builds the core mechanics of movement, combat, and dialogues while using 8x8 pixel art and progressive music.

name: Ronald McDonalds
description: Your objective is to steal the secret recipe from McDonald's without Ronald finding you.

name: I am Dave
description: Is a 3D walking simulator/adventure, where you will go to the office, buy groceries, chat with your colleagues. Live a completely normal life until you start to notice weird stuff and signs from the universe. By the way, who is Dave?

name: Death Elevator
description: Death Elevator is a simple roguelike where every hit is lethal but time slows down whenever you are in danger. Reach the top floor or die trying!

name: Oddsmaker
description: Play as 4 children on a journey to restore the balance of power on Earth after a cataclysmic war & subsequent invention of a devastating weapon has all but decimated human civilization as we know it.

name: The Posthumous Investigation
description: Travel to a noir Rio de Janeiro in 1937 and investigate the mystery behind the murder of Bras Cubas, the famed character created by Machado de Assis. Until the truth is out, you'll be trapped in a time loop, amidst a plot full of conspiracy and treason.

name: Space Inversion Puzzle
description:
Puzzle Meets Arcade Invader style visuals in this stylish addictive game from our massively popular Space Inversion game series.
Can you stop the advancement of the alien invaders ?
Shoot detonators to create explosion combo chains. use your tractor beam pull in and move objects around to create chain reactions.

name: Buggle Blast
description:
Join over 10 million Buggle fans in the newest game in the hit series!
Andrew the cute honey bear is back! And this time he's bringing his bee friends for a honey loving match-3 puzzle adventure! Swap and match your way through hundreds of fun and exciting puzzle games! Collect honey and blast sweet candy with Andrew, the lovable baby bear. Enjoy endless fun times with cute and colorful free to play puzzle games!

name: Ant War: Kingdom Battles
description:
Gather and stack up sugar cubes to build your glory ant nest.
Upgrade your ant nest to a bigger and stronger one.
Compete with other enemies' ant armies to find out the best player.
Recruit lost ants to build up your army and get a larger colony.
Higher-level nests will hatch more ants for your team.
Free ants can steal from other ants to bring more sugar cubes to your nest.

name: Uncle Slam Vice Squad
description: Uncle Slam is a touch-based boxing game. You choose your fighter from the Vice Presidents of the United States – some almost great, some with aspirations of near-greatness – and battle your way forth. Can you defeat all your opponents?

name: Sharper Minds: Brain Games
description:
Want a collection of fun brain games for adults and kids that requires no registration? and works offline?
Try Sharper Minds. It's 15 fun games for the brain that require no registration or Internet.

name: The Wars II Evolution
description:
From the depths of the stone age to space wars of the future, walk all the way of the evolution of mankind and defeat the enemies in the new game, “The Wars 2 Evolution”.
At the first glance, the idea of the game is simple and trivial – to destroy the enemy’s base. But it may not be as easy as it seems. To successfully accomplish the mission, you must think as a military strategist. Choose your game tactics at each level and age. And only the right balance between defense and attack will give you a chance to win. Engage super weapons and gain a tactical advantage over the enemy.
Destroy the enemy’s units and wipe the enemy’s base. For that, you will gain the knowledge for studying units and buildings of the next age. The gold obtained along the course of the game can be spent on valiant soldiers who would not let you down in battle and on weapons for defending your base.

name: Space Combat: Galaxy Wars
description: Space Combat: Galaxy Wars pushes you in a Universe where your team is tasked with maintaining peace throughout the galaxy. Whether its to prevent conflict or protecting civilizations from unthinkable cosmic evil, your team acts as a guardian force for the galaxy. Always the first one to answer the distress call anywhere in charted space, you are there as a protector, answering the call of of duty.

name: Awakening Sarah
description: Awakening Sarah is an upcoming sequel to Dreaming Sarah, a 2D platformer with an emphasis on exploration. Unravel the dreams and realities of Sarah, a girl who's recovering from a coma, while helping her understand the world around her and herself.

name: Hungry Corgi
description:
The game is based on a real corgi who loves to eat! Relaxing and fun music game!
Hungry Corgi is a music game where you feed the dog to music and try to catch the rhythm of the cutest songs created especially for this game. A perfect way to relax and have fun playing the cutest while also challenging rhythm game. Join to corgi adventure to meet new friends by opening characters, listen to fun songs and unlock incredible themes that change everything!

name: Reshape
description: Reshape - the title speaks for itself! Slide or swipe your finger to rotate a central cube, connect approaching triangles by letting them collide with cube. Score as many points as possible and form as many cubes as possible.

name: Grandpa Rally
description:
Help crazy grandpa in this rally game! Grandpa Rally goal is simple swap tracks and do not crash into other grandpa's. Try to run as many laps you can.
Grandpa Rally is a FREE game with addictive and easy one button game play. Grandpa Rally will seriously challenge your skills and reflexes!

name: Sled Bandit
description:
He is Bandit, Sled Bandit. Many have heard of this mysterious figure, but few have seen him. It has been said that he is the best snowmobiler ever. According to rumors, Sled Bandit is an outstanding snowmobile handler.
The villagers are rumored that Sled Bandit will make the longest jumps and the biggest flips. He climbs the steepest hills and performs longest wheelies in his snowmobile.

name: Clouds & Sheep
description:
They're cute, they're fluffy and they love to play! Care for a flock of adorable little sheep in this excessively cute and charming sandbox game!
The fluffy and sweet balls of wool love it when you play and interact with them. Adorable as they may be, they´re not very smart. If there's a poisonous mushroom, they'll eat it. When the sun is shining, they'll just stand there until they have a heatstroke - and when the weather turns bad, they'll happily stand under thunderclouds and rain until they catch a cold or get struck by thunder and lightning. If you keep them healthy and entertained, they'll reward you with Happy Stars and make lots of little black and white baby sheep.

name: Hill 4x4 Tuning Rivals
description: HILL 4X4 TUNING RIVALS offers you head-to-head racing with hill climb style through green forest and sandy desert against opponent (AI) with different strength. Race and win races to be able to unlock next tiers. Collect racing points (RP) upgrade your car or purchase a better one. If you don't like looks of your car you have a possibility to change color, decal and rim.

name: Maze Defenders
description: Maze Defenders is a fantasy tower defense like the classics. Craft advanced mazes for the enemies to travel, deploy your arsenal of over 17 Towers and cast mighty spells with your Builder.

name: Magic Tower: Tap Defense
description: Defend the Midgard by building the Magic Tower from the attack of the Hellheim monsters.

name: Super Final Strike
description: Super Final Strike is a soccer simulator in which you can improve your soccer skills (with the ball, your professional career and the surrounding). You will have the chance to shine in front of your supporters and to invest your profits in order to improve your skills.

name: Bike Unchained
description: Download now and shred sweet trails, including tracks from the world’s premier freeride event Red Bull Rampage! Get the coolest bikes, travel the world and build your crew to ride against your ultimate rival - Team Praedor - and battle for a top spot on the podium.

name: Multi Level Car Parking Simulator
description: Multi Level Car Parking Simulator now bigger and better than ever before! It’s all you’ve been waiting for! Park at the ultra-realistic multi-level car park, in a variety of awesome cars. Can you handle them all?

name: World Soccer Challenge
description:
Inspired by classic footie games of the 90's, World Soccer Challenge offers an exciting opportunity to replay and be part of the history of international soccer.
Qualify your national team and try to win the International Cup at Russia. You can even go back to Mexico 86 and play as West Germany, Yugoslavia or the Soviet Union.

name: Island Golf
description:
Island Golf is a simple, easy-to-play arcade game where you play a quick round of golf with fairways on little lonely islands. There's no complex system of club types, swing meters or wind direction here. You just tap, drag, and release to take a shot.
Every day a new course appears. See if you can beat par on each hole, and how low you can score through all 18. If you do well, you may even make the high score board for that day. If not, there's always tomorrow.

name: Football Thug Life Soccer
description: Sin descripción

name: Grand Mini Slam
description:
Grab the balls and take up the challenge in this incredible unique sport.
Can you win the Grand Mini Slam?
Beat all your opponents and reach the top of the rankings in the wackiest championship ever, explore many different courts and game modes and become a Grand Mini Slammers!

name: X-Plane: Starship
description:
SpaceX is about to fly a Starship to 45,000 and belly-flop to a landing in Texas.
Here's your chance to fly the mission yourself.
And then... try it on Mars.
All with realistic physics.

name: Fold & Cut
description:
Make folds like real paper and cut when you’re ready to match to the target shape.
Challenge part is to make less cuts, ideally only one.
It might sound easy but, as the game progresses it definitely becomes more challenging and levels will become much harder to solve.
Be ready for more than 400 levels of fun!

name: Daredevil Rider
description:
Only the most daring drivers (or the craziest) are able to pull of these amazing stunts. They need to be one tough cookie in order to get behind the while of a motorcycle and launch themselves off a ramp without any safety net. In DareDevil Rider you can attempt these awesome stunts from your mobile device…without risking your life or a lot of serious injuries.
In DareDevil Rider YOU are the ultimate acrobatic stuntman! Test your skills and overcome intense obstacles to pull off the stunts. You’ll be expected to jump through rings of fire and over obstacles like trucks, cars, airplanes, helicopters...and few other surprising objects. Your goal is to land on the braking ramp that marks the end of the level.

name: Idle Submarine
description: Idle Submarine is an adventure idle - game. Start commanding of Submarine, join the international round-the-world race and become the best captain. The race will not be an easy walk, the opponents are strong, and to become the first, upgrade the boat on the move: engine, production system, jet section, cargo hold. Collect unexplored resources at the bottom, complete quests for Mr. Dave Johnson, explore caves and design your unique Submarine. Seal the hatch and let's go!

name: Flowerhorn Aquarium
description:
Flowerhorn Aquarium is a 3D simulation aquarium game that mimics the famous freshwater champion fish, Flowerhorn fish. Flowerhorn Aquarium features realistic graphics, with outstanding lighting and natural fish animation. In addition, it plays along with relaxing music to calm and relieve from your daily stress.
Customize your aquarium with different aquarium plants, along with beautiful underwater wood, river rocks, and aquarium fine sands to create a phenomenal, state-of-art scene.

name: Musynx: House Theme
description:
1 Added HOUSE theme default drop interface
2 Added HOUSE theme classic drop interface
3 Rainbow theme vertical drop interface
4 Added new song：HOUSE PLAN

name: Murder Is Game Over: Deal Killer
description: Murder Is Game Over: Deal Killer takes you on an immersive journey through the Italian Alps. Unravel the murder mystery amidst an alpine backdrop, exploring opulent settings and unmasking the killer in this thrilling detective game.

name: Sweet Sort
description: Sin descripción

name: Russian Car Driver: UAZ Hunter
description: Sin descripción

name: Gas Station Inc.
description: Sin descripción

name: Panzer War
description: Sin descripción

name: Redline: Sport
description: Sin descripción

name: Bricks King
description: Sin descripción

name: Pooking: Billiards City
description: Sin descripción

name: Epic Ape Madness
description: Sin descripción

name: Lumber Inc Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Jigsawship
description: Sin descripción

name: Shopping Manager
description: Sin descripción

name: Sushi Sort
description: Sin descripción

name: 4x4 Real Off Road
description: Sin descripción

name: World of Submarines
description: Sin descripción

name: Hercules V: Platinum Edition
description: 12 Labours of Hercules V: Kids of Hellas follows Hercules on his fifth resourceful ride to save Greece! Ares, Greek god of war, asks Hercules to lead his armies. When Hercules refuses, Ares casts a curse over the children of Hellas. Can you craft your way through countless obstacles and save the kids in 12 Labours of Hercules V: Kids of Hellas?

name: Pain Loop
description: Pain Loop is a horror game where you are a 6-year-old little girl named Nina who, after experiencing the assassination of her older brother by a killer with details that remain unknown. She is disturbed every night by horrible nightmares in which her room is transformed into a dark and claustrophobic environment.

name: Slippery Sid
description: Sin descripción

name: Thorn for the Villain: Reincarnated as an Extra in an Otome Game?!
description: When an office lady end up reincarnated as a noble lady in an otome game she was playing, she decides to intervene into preventing the story from never starting... however, her actions catches the attention of the game's original villainous underground organization, Snare.

name: Final Fantasy XI: A Moogle Kupo d'Etat
description: Add on scenario for Final Fantasy XI

name: Aiyra
description:
Join this adventure with Aiyra, the world is in danger, and It's up to Aiyra to save the guardians of the forest so that together they can defeat the evil that is reappearing!

Aiyra is a platform game with action and puzzle elements. In each chapter, new mechanics are introduced, and combined they allow the player to choose their own path! You will face many challenges, dealing with a variety of combat and puzzles involving elemental arrows! In the path of Aiyra's journey, she will deal with tons of demons, and also corrupted animals, that she's not allowed to kill!

name: Final Fantasy XI: A Shantotto Ascension
description: Add on Scenario for Final Fantasy XI

name: Final Fantasy XI: Vision of Abyssea
description: Add-on Scenario for Final Fantasy XI

name: Final Fantasy XI: Scars of Abyssea
description: Add-on Scenario for Final Fantasy XI

name: Final Fantasy XI: Heroes of Abyssea
description: Add-on Scenario for Final Fantasy XI

name: MiSide
description: MiSide is an adventure game with horror elements, telling the story of a simple guy who, for mystical reasons, finds himself in a mobile simulation. Appearing in the house he has just observed on his smartphone screen, the hero becomes confused. The stunned guy follows the instructions of a certain device he discovered in the bedroom. A few moments later, he is greeted by a pretty girl, whose image is also familiar to the young man from this mobile game.

name: Monument Valley 2: The Lost Forest
description: The Lost Forest is a special chapter to Monument Valley 2. It was created for the Playing For The Planet Green Game Jam and to raise awareness towards environmental causes.

name: Cheogsh
description: A wad for Doom II: Hell on Earth with 1 very large map.

name: Smash Remix: Version 1.1.0
description: The first post-beta update for Smash Remix added Sonic the Hedgehog (and Classic Sonic) as a new playable character, new stages (including some based on the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise, among others) and new features and modes like the Home Run Contest.

name: Smash Remix: Version 1.2.0
description: The second update to Smash Remix brings Sheik as a new playable character, along with many new stages and features.

name: Smash Remix: Version 1.3.0
description: The third update to Smash Remix adds Marina from Mischief Makers to the roster, along with King Dedede from the Kirby series. There are also new stages and new features.

name: Smash Remix: Version 1.4.0
description:
The fourth update to Smash Remix adds Goemon from the Mystical Ninja/Goemon franchise to the roster, along with new stages and features.

Two new playable characters from the Star Fox series were added: Slippy Toad and Peppy Hare.

name: NBA 2K24
description: Grab your squad and experience the past, present, and future of hoops culture in NBA 2K24. Enjoy pure, authentic action and limitless personalized MyPLAYER options in MyCAREER. Collect an impressive array of legends and build your perfect lineup in MyTEAM. Relive your favorite eras as a GM or Commissioner in MyNBA. Experience next-level gameplay and lifelike visuals with your favorite NBA and WNBA teams in play now.

name: Ex Vitro
description: Ex Vitro is a dark sci-fi 2D platformer where you delve into the ruins of a military research facility and discover the horrors within. Whether machine, creature, or something else entirely, you’ll face the violent legacy of the last survivors of humanity.

name: Omniheroes
description: Omniheroes is a valkyries fantasy casual strategy RPG that is now available in the Philippines, Indonesia, Australia, New Zealand, Malaysia, Singapore,etc. Pre-register now to receive great rewards in the future.

name: Half-Life Alyx NoVR
description: Half-Life Alyx NoVR is a mod that lets you experience the next story in the Half-Life universe on a flat screen, without any VR equipment. It adapts most of the VR interactions and features to a traditional mouse and keyboard setup, such as gravity gloves, weapon upgrades, cranks, doors, cabinets and more. It also supports many other workshop mods that enhance the gameplay and visuals.

name: Medieval: Defense & Conquest
description: Unique mix of wave tower defense, war strategy, idle game, and kingdom management warrior game.

name: Annihilation: Space Tycoon
description: The fate of the Multiverse is in your hands! If you like comics, science, adventure and idle clickers we have great news for you! Even if you like capitalist tycoon idle games it's definitely for you!

name: Idle Robots
description: Have you ever dreamed about programming your own robot from scratch? Build it step by step choosing the best parts for it, becoming every step closer to a great robot tycoon feeling? Well, now it’s more possible than ever. Give it a try and figure out how it gets created within the idle game.

name: Joy Match 3D
description: Get ready for a fun, interesting and challenging matching triple game.

name: Happy Harvest!
description: Welcome to the world of casual farming and idle shopkeeping! In this exciting game, you'll take on the role of a farmer, growing crops and raising animals to sell in your own shop.

name: Mega Man: Wily Tower
description: Sin descripción

name: Koro-koro Reimu 2
description: This is the second installment of the side-scrolling action game Korokoro Reimu.

name: Graveyard Miner
description: Enter the world of Graveyard Miner, an exciting mobile game that combines the best of tycoon merge games and mining clicker games. As a graveyard miner, you'll explore graves to find treasures, bones, and artifacts, unlocking new graveyards, upgrading your minions, and collecting cards and special abilities to become a graveyard tycoon.

name: Idle Mining Company
description: This miner game is an idle simulation game where you can invest to become a rich capitalist millionaire businessman. The aim of this gold digging game is to develop your mining empire by making investments to get as much cash and idle cash as possible.

name: Idle Lemonade Tycoon Empire
description: Have you ever dreamed to be a rich lemonade business tycoon and sell juicy drinks at your own lemonade stand? Play the world’s best idle tycoon simulator game, farm lemons, blend lemonade to get a lemonade factory tycoon and an idle hero. Challenge accepted?

name: Return Alive
description: Return Alive is a Free-to-Play Top-down Tactical Shooter Game.

name: Kowloon's Rhizome: A Day of the Fire - Vol. 1
description: Kowloon's Rhizome: A Day of the Fire is an Adventure game.

name: Lone Tower Roguelite Defense
description: Lone Tower is an idle tower defense game with a unique twist of Idle and Roguelike features. Lone Tower is inspired by games such as Oregon Trail and The Tower, it is an incremental tower defense game where you control and upgrade a single tower and have to survive as many days as possible. There is farming, card collecting, mining, and plenty of repairs to do in order to survive each day! Defend your tower until its destroyed, earn coins & gems to unlock permanent upgrades, then give it another try! Build the perfect tower for defense against fantasy creatures and foes!

name: Kowloon's Rhizome: A Day of the Fire - Vol. 2
description: Kowloon's Rhizome: A Day of the Fire is an Adventure game.

name: Kowloon's Rhizome: A Day of the Fire - Vol. 3
description: Kowloon's Rhizome: A Day of the Fire is an Adventure game.

name: Pocket Land
description: Get ready to discover a world full of farming fun, where you can collect and sell crops with just one finger control, upgrade your character, and harvest like a pro.

name: Alpaca Farm! Animal Adventure
description: Get ready to build the most exciting alpaca empire! Take care of amazing alpacas. Build and expand your farm. Beat the competition in exciting trade shows.

name: String Art
description: Use strings to make your art!

name: Pacer: Classic
description: Immerse yourself in Pacer: Classic, an adrenaline-fueled anti-gravity racing game set in a vast, interconnected universe. Personalize your paceship and weapons, engage in a riveting campaign, or single-player races, or even face off against your foes in a dynamic online multiplayer race within the expansive PacerVerse.

name: 1 Date Danger
description: It's your first semester at the prestigious Lombardi University, and you've immediately dived head first into the chaos of organizing the student-run New Year festival. You immediately befriend Trait, a kind but slightly disturbed rabbit, and his best friend Stoney, a perma-stoned dog who keeps up a strong emotional guard around new people. What will you do to win their hearts?

name: Call of the VoYD Genesis
description: Top Down Action Shooter with Discord connect for competitions.

name: Geminism
description: Two twin sisters, Hirosoma Kikyou and Hirosoma Shinku, clash together in a nook of a midnight city. The fight is watched over by two mysterious men, Yamaga and Tsukishiro. Just what is at stake in their battle?

name: Doodle Dice Monsters
description: Doodle Dice Monsters is a fast and strategic turn-based game where you get to draw your own characters! Form your six character dream team, then fight in tag-team combat in either multi-player or single-player mode: the winner not only gets epic loot, but gets to take one of the defeated Doodlemon for their own!

name: Treasure Towers
description: Treasure Towers is an exciting platform game in which you have to climb to the top of a tower before the water reaches you. Your character has a hot air balloon that will escape him, but you must be quick and skilled to reach the top before it's too late.

name: Mega Man 10: Bass Mode
description: Play the game as Bass. Bass can shoot in 7 directions. Some of his abilities differ from Mega Man's. Not compatible with Rankings or Challenges.

name: Mega Man 10: Special Stage 1
description:
Gives you another Time Attack Stage to try, including a new Boss at the end!
Results will be displayed in the Rankings.
Not compatible with Trophies or Challenges.

name: Mega Man 10: Special Stage 2
description:
Gives you another Time Attack Stage to try, including a new Boss at the end!
Results will be displayed in the Rankings.
Not compatible with Trophies or Challenges.

name: Mega Man 10: Special Stage 3
description:
Gives you another Time Attack Stage to try, including a new Boss at the end!
Results will be displayed in the Rankings.
Not compatible with Trophies or Challenges.

name: Mega Man 10: Endless Attack
description: Test your skills on a stage without end. Try to break the record for getting the farthest. Results will be displayed in the Rankings. Not compatible with Trophies or Challenges.

name: Arugisu no Tsubasa
description: Arugisu no Tsubasa (Wings of Arugis) is a sequel for Miracle Warriors: Seal of the Dark Lord.

name: Nomltest
description: Sin descripción

name: Le Fol
description: Le Fol is a 2D game/art proposition inspired by the story of the Fool's Journey, an interpretation of the Marseille tarot. experience life through the iris, choose your paths and the worlds you walk through.

name: Magic and Legend: Star Seekers
description:
Magic and Legend: Star Seekers is an arcade platformer with the goal of collecting stars across multiple levels themed on locations around the world with a variety of other game styles in between.
The second in a planned trilogy of homebrew games.

name: Grandmaster's Gambit
description: A different take on the chess genre. Build massively overpowered decks to fend off endless hordes of chess-like pieces and seek out the 8 Grandmasters in this open-world deckbuilding roguelike experience.

name: Romarinho a Caminho do Gol
description: Romarinho a Caminho do Gol is an interactive CD-ROM featuring puzzle and soccer-related games.

name: Cuber 2: Ice Age
description: Cuber 2: Ice Age is the sequel of Cuber if your not sure you will like this game play Cuber one and then come back.

name: The Groundskeeper
description: After a horrific accident, you find yourself trapped in an unfamiliar place where no one can hear you scream. There's a dark presence... A dark secret that this place holds. Is there any way out? Is HE watching?

name: Power Rangers: Beats of Power - Special Edition
description: Power Rangers: Beats of Power Special Edition is a version of the game with several improvements, such as support for 4 players, one additional Zord level, new easy mode and life bars for bosses.

name: Meowth's Party
description: A cancelled Pokémon game for the Nintendo GameCube to show the capabilities.

name: Holding Keys
description: Step into the shoes of a food enthusiast and embark on a gastronomic adventure like no other. Unlock hidden taste profiles by holding the keys while preparing a wide range of dishes from various cuisines. Engage in fun time mechanics, experiment with ingredients, and challenge yourself with time management.

name: Tsukihime Typing Online
description: a versus typing game featuring the cast of Tsukihime

name: Zen Koi
description: Zen Koi is a fun, relaxing and stylish mobile game experience from LandShark Games. Grow, breed and collect beautiful Japanese carp as they make their way to mythological dragon form.

name: Tomb Raider II: The Forbidden Place
description:
This is a game made with Tomb Raider Level Editor. It uses the mechanics of Tomb Raider 2 while recreating its entire story.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2023.

name: Balance The Stick
description: Sin descripción

name: Tales from My Ass: Slice of Death
description: My first-person horror adventure about the night I delivered a pizza to a haunted manor full of deadly traps, knife-wielding cultists, and lots of gore. This all actually happened to me. How it all ended will shock you the most!

name: Semaforo Climber
description: Sin descripción

name: S.P.L.I.C.E.D.
description: S.P.L.I.C.E.D. is a free Metroidvania made by students from Breda University of Applied Sciences. Traverse a Biopunk Chinatown with high mobility and difficult combat encounters.

name: Solar Empire
description: Sin descripción

name: Virtual WarZone
description:
Pilot a Next Generation Tank with 3-D HUD!

You are a tank commander remote piloting a future generation tank in the year 2179. Unknown enemy forces have attacked and turned your country into a WarZone! Using a red laser based heads-up display (HUD), your tank gives you see-through armor capabilities, while allowing you to pilot from a remote fortified location. Your objective is to stay alive and hunt down enemy AI powered sentry towers, tanks, and helicopters.

You navigate your tank using your onboard radar and compass. Two primary weapons are at your fingertips: a machine gun and a BFG. Use your machine gun wisely or it overheats. Your BFG packs a bigger punch but takes time to reload. Aim carefully and always be on the lookout for enemies that are constantly hunting you!

Good luck commander.

name: The Empress: Awakening
description:
Embark on a Mystical Journey with the Ba'als
Venture to the mystic isles of the old gods, the Ba'als, with our hero in this epic journey. Prove your worthiness by battling challenging courses, facing diverse enemies, overcoming obstacles, and defeating the usurping witch to liberate the people.

Immerse yourself in the story-driven hack n' slash game, inspired by the untapped ancient civilizations of the Middle East. The story begins with the creation of the One World, One Universe by the Great Presence and the five Ba'als, and the entrustment of a human, the Custodian, to rule over humanity. However, peace was disrupted when a witch killed the Custodian and claimed the throne. In response, Hadad, the Ba'al of sands, chose a hero to restore peace and end the chaos.

Unleash the full potential of your Rooh powers through 64 possible combos, 16 unique abilities and attacks, 4 distinctive weapons, and 2 transformative modes in the dynamic combat system.

Explore 5 different levels and 9 intriguing locations filled with hidden artifacts and Easter Eggs.

name: Sonic.Exe: The Spirits of Hell
description: Sin descripción

name: Requiem
description: We designed this as an experiment to use the concept of a game and a song to communicate something a little different than usual. This is best experienced first on your own with a pair of headphones and no distractions from beginning to end.

name: Phobolis
description:
Phobolis is a surreal horror adventure taking place within the Phobolis: A purgatory superstructure hidden in deep woods for all who have lost themselves. You play as Moment, a mysterious character that has, by merit of your participation, made the choice* to enter its gates in an effort to reach the top and be free.

There is no death in Phobolis. Each time a person dies, a new manifestation of them is formed at the last gate. However, the bodies left behind return to life as twisted mockeries. Screaming frenzied primal shards of self that others have left behind. Be wary of your self as much as your foes.

name: A Dream About a Room With Four Doors
description:
Ever wanted to be trapped in a recurring nightmare? Sure, we all do! Now here's your chance to plunge into a malevolent DrEaMScApE, and to try to find your way out.
A Dream About a Room With 4 Doors puts you in the pajamas of a tormented soul who can't wake up until overcoming the challenges of their own nightmare. Something in the dream-realm wants to keep the sleeper asleep forever -- but now another force has arrived to help find a way out!

This game will be evolving over time, with new puzzles and challenges in future updates. Your support will help me have the time and resources to continue development.

name: A Maze 3D
description: A Maze 3D is a old school hyper casual labyrinth ball game where the goal is to roll through complex labyrinths with obstacles that gets increasingly difficult as you get further in. Highly challenging, hand-crafted experience, cool graphics and much more!

name: Working Noir
description:
How far will one man go to prove his innocence?

Working Title Noir Game is an action adventure game featuring a hard-boiled detective framed for murder. Play in your own style, stealth, melee, action shooter... Different styles will reveal different endings.

name: Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Extraction: React Strike Pack
description:
Enhance your Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Extraction experience with the REACT Strike Pack, including:

Frontline Cosmetic Pack (includes Spectrum headgear, uniform and weapon skin, plus the REACT Lockjaw charm)
REACT Strike Pack, XP Boosters for postlaunch events
10% discount on the in-game store
This content is also available by purchasing Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Extraction Deluxe Edition.

name: Ascendia
description: A rage game inspired by limbo and getting over it developed by Mollkiee.

name: The Secret of Porta Piratica
description: The Secret of Porta Piratica is an unofficial Sea of Thieves fan game. It tells the story of how your pirate ends up on Old Sailors Isle at the start of the Maiden Voyage.

name: The Experiment
description: A 21 level megawad for Doom II

name: Bloodline
description:
A megawad for Doom II in development for 3000 hours.

Tonight is your last shift.

You take another sip of your warm drink (most probably a "Mud Slapper", which is an extremely hot beverage, brewed from demon fudge and Arch Vile blood.

Suddenly you notice a "RED ALERT" warning on your screen.

You leave your cabin and head out back to the U.A.C. Headquarters to investigate...

name: Action Mania
description: Sin descripción

name: Uno
description: A Japanese game adaptation of the Mattel card game Uno, featuring a story mode set in a high school's Uno Club.

name: Kalikan
description: Kalikan is a vertically scrolling bullet hell 'shmup inspired by Dodonpachi- pushing the limits of ~virtual~ hardware . Control one of 3 1 ship(s) featuring two varied attack modes . Maintain your chain to compete for the highest scores.

name: Dark Table CCG
description:
Dark Table CCG is multiplayer card gaming re-imagined: Free-to-play, online 4-player, cheaper and easier deck-building, more customization that matters, and a focus on social atmosphere and building friendships. We listened to everything card gamers desperately want, that AAA is not providing, and built it into an experience that will be unparalleled.

Set in a grim Lovecraftian theme, Dark Table brings a unique strategic experience with up to 4 players battling in a free-for-all, using temporary alliances and mutual interest to get ahead. Select your leader and build your deck around it to survive the onslaught and claim your world.

name: Uchuu Senkan Yamato
description: 1985 Japanese exclusive Laserdisc video game designed by Taito which was based on the television series of the same name. Game Machine listed Space Battleship Yamato on their August 1, 1985 issue as being the second most-successful upright/cockpit arcade unit of the month.

name: Uchuu Senkan Yamato HD Remaster
description:
Remaster of the 1985 Laserdisc arcade game Uchuu Senkan Yamato.

Apart of the Taito LD Game Collection.

name: Time Gal HD Remaster
description:
An HD remaster of an action game in which Reika, the ace of the historical security police, goes back in time and tracks down the future great villain Luda, who stole a time machine and fled to the past.

Apart of the Taito LD Game Collection.

name: Revenge of the Ninja HD Remaster
description:
Included in the Taito LD Game Collection.

The player guides Hayate through the "Castle of Evil" avoiding dubious traps and fighting various enemies such as "the fire breathing Marco Killmore, the Wolves of Seidenfeld," and "the Immortal Skeleton Warriors of the Undead."

The gameplay is in the format of an interactive movie where the player has a limited amount of time to hit the right commands from the prompts on screen. The success or failure of completing these quick-time events will determine the set of animation you will receive, which will either depict Hayate delving further into the castle or humorously being squished between a wall of spikes. The player earns a score for how well they can run through each level and time the button presses.

If players were able to master the game and complete the game on hard mode, the publisher Renovation Products, Inc. would supply the player with a "Master of Ninja Arts" degree.

name: Taito LD Game Collection
description: A collection of Taito's LaserDisc games: Time Gal, Uchuu Senkan Yamato (Space Battleship Yamato), and Revenge of the Ninja for Nintendo Switch.

name: Uchuu Senkan Yamato
description: Uchuu Senkan Yamato on the Game Boy is an adaptation of the anime series of the same name, also known as Space Battleship Yamato and Star Blazers. It adapts the story of the original 1974 television series.

name: Uchuu Senkan Yamato
description:
Uchuu Senkan Yamato is based on the anime series Space Battleship Yamato, also known as Star Blazers. The events of the game follow those of the initial episodes.

This incarnation of the series is essentially a real-time strategy game with a somewhat unusual approach to the genre. Rather than navigating units on battlefields, the player takes direct control of every crew member onboard the ship. Each one of them is responsible for a certain function (supplying power, manning a gun, turning the ship, etc.); in order to win battles, it is crucial to coordinate their actions. The game proceeds in real time, but pauses when the player accesses crew members and performs actions for them.

name: Marble It Up! Ultra
description:
Marble It Up! Ultra is the pinnacle of marble platforming from the minds behind Marble It Up! and Marble Blast. World-class level design, buttery-smooth controls, gorgeous visuals, and exhilarating multiplayer - welcome to the ultimate marble experience!

Roll through an extensive single-player campaign filled with dangerous obstacles, mind-bending paths, shifting gravity, bouncy floors, and potent power-ups.

Embrace the five competitive and chaotic multiplayer modes. Team up to hunt gems, score goals, escape zombies, and prove your marble mettle online. Blast your way to glory!

Unlock a magnificent collection of marbles, trails, and hats! Find hidden trophies, earn medals, and play online - all while earning your next piece of marble fashion.

Push yourself to the next level. Hunting achievements and climbing the Global Leaderboards are sure-fire ways to become a marble master! Weekly Challenges add new modifiers to levels for a fresh new way to compete each week!

Get ready to roll!

name: River City: Rival Showdown
description:
River City Ransom is back, rebuilt from the ground up! Rekindle old rivalries and relive past rumbles through a completely revamped story!

A re-release of the classic Nintendo 3DS sandbox brawler, this version of the game has been updated with tweaked controls, graphical upgrades, and a new online mode in the form of Double Dragon Duel 2023.

name: NightmareScape
description: A port of In Nightmare under the name NightmareScape.

name: Soulcrusher
description: Sin descripción

name: Who Is Your Prince? In the Rich School
description: A visual novel included in the Story Me app.

name: Delaweare
description: The independent video game Delaweare is a free ZDoom based first person shooter in which the emphasis is put on visual and audio experiences. The aim of the game is to explore its strange world to collect all music tracks.

name: Taboo 5
description: A otome game included in the Story Me app.

name: Brulo's Ballble Teafense!
description:
You work the 24/7 at your own bar. Between dealing with rabid rodents and wild customers, you have your hands full. Today seems to be your unlucky day.

The Ballbusters have planned their biggest raid yet, and every hour seems to be rush hour! It's up to you to take care of these pests... well, and the moles too.

name: Ghost and Joker: A thing to do for you
description: A visual novel included in the Story Me app.

name: Vampire Doctor
description: A otome game included in the Story Me app.

name: Dual
description: Otome game included in the Story Me app.

name: Kawaii Kingdom
description: A horror visual novel included in the Story Me app.

name: Stella: My Friend
description: A visual novel included in the Story Me app.

name: Gemini City: Science and Magic
description: Fantasy otome visual novel included in the Story Me app.

name: November
description: Otome game in the Story Me app.

name: Fun Cube
description: Fun Cube is an arcade medal game machine released by Namco from December 2000 to December 2002. Three mini-games were recorded in one machine, and since 1 to 5 were in operation, there were 15 kinds of mini-games in total.

name: Sooty & Sweep
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Hell
description:
Explorers of Hell is a ROM hack of Explorers of Sky with several features, for example, new Pokémon, new items, and a very high difficulty. The dialogues have also been modified and are aimed at a more advanced audience.

With Pokemon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Hell, you can expect: A very high difficulty, New starters, and new Pokemon from generations 5 to 8. New dungeons, boss battles, and items. New dialogues (lots of memes and humor). The fairy type.

The rom hack was developed by babou.

name: Celeste Mario's Zap & Dash!
description: A hastily done minihack (with levels designed within 2 months) that features Celeste-styled gameplay.

name: EA Sports UFC 5
description: EA Sports UFC 5 is as real as it gets. Powered by Frostbite engine’s advanced rendering capabilities, your favorite fighters now have unparalleled character likenesses to complement next-level environment fidelity that’ll make their walk to the Octagon feel like a PPV main event. The all-new authentic damage system brings the intensity and strategy of a fight to life, as cuts and strikes absorbed can affect mobility, defense, stamina, and more. Take too much damage, and the doctor will check to see if you’re able to continue. For lovers of the ground game, the new Transition-Based Submissions make grappling feel more fluid and realistic than ever before. And if you like to admire your handiwork, new Cinematic K.O. Replays capture your fight-ending finishes in all their punishing glory. Plus, a completely revamped live service schedule builds exciting challenges around all PPV fight weeks. Bring the next evolution of the fight game home with UFC 5.

name: Groove Club
description: Art house game by eccentric creative Antoine Josset. The Groove Club is at the end of Paradise Lost Boulevard. Dont be late for your rendezvous....

name: Glasses
description: Early work of Studio Pixel, you play as a short guy interested in catching his glasses.

name: Clean Half-Life
description: Actions take place during half-life 1. We play as a scientist in HEV and try to get out of the black mesa. Passing through the trials of a terrible catastrophe, you gradually solve a terrible riddle. Can you get to the key that will open the scary curtain of secrecy?

name: Elf Bowling Holiday Pack
description:
Elf Bowling Holiday Bundle Game. The elves have a present for you! No, it's not a bag of smelly socks...it's two games, in one! Not only do you get to follow their wild escapades in Elf Bowling The Last Insult, but you can also join them on a tropical trip in Elf Bowling Hawaiian Vacation!

Either way, you'll compete in a variety of bowling games where the elves are the pins and there's no shortage of insults and colorful commentary! So, start the season off right with the Elf Bowling Holiday Bundle! It's wacky, elfish, festive fun!

name: Cinderella Cafe
description: Cinderella Cafe is an entertaining restaurant management game. In the game, you have to help Cinderella revive her restaurant business with the help of Cuby and his friends. To do so, you will have to make use of your skills so that customers are satisfied and you are able to offer the best service.

name: Guess the Movie: Quiz Game
description:
Do you remember posters of your favorite movies? Will you guess what the film is in front of you by the actors on the poster? Will you remember the name of the cartoon character on the image?

This quiz is a real catch for any cinephile! 750 movies, cartoons and TV series, 50 interesting levels, classic movies and current movies of different genres and countries of production — all are in one application.

name: Dungeon Stalkers
description: Dungeon Stalkers is a PVEVP dungeon crawler game where you can experience the joy of exploration and survival in a classic RPG. Join forces with your companions to defeat other adventurers and monsters, and acquire equipment and treasures. Then, escape safely from the witch's curse!

name: Amedama
description: Side-scrolling, soul-shifting sandbox action adventure brought to life with a striking new 2D style! With only his soul remaining, Yushin must fight tooth and nail, possessing body after body on a quest to find his sister. With just seven days left until his soul departs, can he save her in time?

name: Polar Games
description: Polar Games is a collection of great winter-themed sports games. Get more out of your favorite bowling and golfing action. Features Polar Golf and Polar Bowler.

name: Polar Games 2
description: From the tropics to the poles, Polar Golfer Pineapple Cup and Polar Pool promise hilarious good times in the latest installment of Polar Games. Reunite with your Polar Games friends to stroll and shoot down tropical fairways in Polar Golfer Pineapple Cup. Ocean hazards, erupting volcanoes, and brand new comical characters make Pineapple Cup a hole in one! Swing away with one paw and improve your score with power rings that keep you sailing over scorching lava rock! Grab your favorite Hawaiian shirt and head for the green in Pineapple Cup. Take off your lei and travel down to the arctic in Polar Pool, a billiards game played only the way an inner-tubing polar bear can play! Send your bear sliding across the icy billiards table to slam balls into pockets in 8-ball, 9-ball and Power Pool! Play in single or multiplayer mode to unlock new characters and pool tables during play. Chalk up your cue and prepare for Polar Pool. Billiards like you've never seen them played!

name: Polar Sports Vol.1
description: Head back to the Arctic with your favorite Polar pals in four side-splitting games that include Polar Bowler and Polar Golfer. Plunge into exotic waters from Iceland to the Amazon in Polar Tubing, then dodge the zany zookeeper to find missing penguin Ace in Penguins! Polar Sports Volume 1 present found of your favorite games from the makers of Polar Games.

name: Castle Caper
description: Sin descripción

name: Nature Mahjong
description: Mahjong against the backdrop of mesmerizing nature! Radiating freshness, soothing music and relaxing levels await in this game!

name: Gnomes Garden: Lifeseeds - Collector's Edition
description: The subjects came to the Gnomes Queen with alarming news. All gardens, forests and meadows began to fade. And so throughout the gnomes land!

name: Days in Hill
description: A role-playing game,you need to survive in barren hills.Collect, grow, hunt.

name: Infiltrating a Cult
description: Your mission is to infiltrate a cult with your master. One night, you successfully snuck into the church, but then...

name: An Eye for Optical Theory 1666
description: An Eye for Optical Theroy 1666 is a short point & click horror adventure game with a focus on atmosphere and narrative. It is the plague year of 1666 and Isaac Newton, in lockdown at his home, has been thinking on the topic of Optics, and planning a series of experiments. Will you help him?

name: Invicta: The Next Queen
description: Invicta: The Next Queen is a TopDown Soulslike game where a legendary warrior must fight her way through hell and claim her soul once more. Take the role of Moma as you explore the labyrinthian dungeons that make up the Circle of Greed and defeat King Midas in single combat.

name: Waspkeeper
description: Waspkeeper is an action roguelite game where your main goal is to survive as long as possible in a field full of venomous wasps with one out of four playable characters.

name: Veil: Alter Unknown
description: A mysterious Sci Fi 3D platformer with a grappling hook, glider, and connection lost.

name: Sunny Village
description: This is a strategy game that simulates the construction of villages in the 70s, in which you are a prestigious village leader who leads the people to create a prosperous and happy village from a wasteland.

name: Infinite Random Defense
description: "Infinite Random Defense" is a tile-based rogue-like defense game. Your objective is to combine various units and strategically place them to defeat the incoming enemies. The map expands with each passing moment, challenging you to research the most efficient unit composition and deployment. Build your own unique strategy and defend your realm.

name: Monster Rampage VR
description: Welcome to Monster Rampage - a VR shooter game. You must use all of your skills and resources to defend yourself against the invasion of monsters.

name: Crystania Wars 2
description: A brand new tactical tower defense game series! Unique roguelike and Unique survival gameplay !

name: Little Locked Rooms
description: Join mini-detectives Bo and Sherry as they try to solve mysterious disappearances and impossible murders. Inspect the crime scenes in the shape of tiny dioramas and figure out the clever tricks used by the criminal masterminds!

name: Commandos: Origins
description:
In 2019, Kalypso Media Group announced that a new 'Commandos' title was in development and last year it revealed that newly formed Claymore Game Studios was working on a next-generation installment in the Commandos strategy series.

Commandos: Origins tells the story of a newly founded British commando unit that grows into a brotherhood during its operations against strategic goals of the German Wehrmacht.

The player will control different characters with different abilities from an isometric perspective of the playing field and use them strategically in such a way that the given mission goal is achieved. So you will work your way through the various missions based on historical locations and missions to the respective goal.

name: 2D Dogfight: Lord of Sky
description: "2D Dogfight - Lord of Sky" DLC includes 12 Aircrafts.

name: Le Bonk: Academic Version
description: Imagine, you are a mole armed with a hammer, battling creatures coming out of holes by throwing your hammer to knock them off the stage. Dig into the environment to avoid hammers and use speed to dash into opponents for a powerful knockback. Be the last one standing and Bonk!

name: 1001 Jigsaw. Earth Chronicles 6
description: 1001 photos of our fantastic planet! Discover the breathtaking beauty of our world alongside 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 6!

name: Sap: School Days
description: Be the unseen hand, guiding surreal life across a grid of possibility. Plant the seeds of biomes, creatures, and whimsical machines. Watch your strategic decisions etch vibrant stories. How long can your world survive?

name: SpaceMine
description: SpaceMine is a third-person tower defence game where your mission is to defend your mining operation by building towers and barriers to hold off waves of local fauna and collect enough resources to meet the company's quota.

name: Settler's Odyssey
description: Sandbox and roguelike where you can create your own unique settlement! Protect it from enemies, explore the open world and write your own odyssey.

name: Kami in My House
description: Kami in my House is Eternarration's first product. It's a short visual novel voiced in English.

name: The Sand Table War: Cruciata
description: Be sure to become the King of the Kingdom of Jerusalem!

name: Fox Run
description: Improve your reflexes and gain more experience in your skills to avoid obstacles in your way

name: Paint by Cubes
description: Paint by Cubes is a relaxing, colorful puzzle game. Take control of a coloring cube and solve coloring puzzles according to presented patterns.

name: Pain: Repainted
description: Remember your deepest fear and shame? You get PAIN... the DLC! PAIN: Below Sanity is back, like never seen before, meaning now you can awkwardly steer your ship and feel pure rage with new graphics and many more!

name: Luminous Skies: The Pilgrimage
description: Standalone Expansion Uncover the story across a wider world. Fight challenging battles. Play fun mini games. Gather food and cook it. Harder Difficulty: greater challenges and new story elements.

name: Defense of the Kings
description:
Welcome to Defense of the Kings, the ultimate castle defense game where you get to lead your army to victory and defend your kingdom against fierce warriors and monsters.

In Defense of the Kings, you can choose from five different races of warriors: Ancient, Human, Orc, Forest, and Undead. Each race has unique abilities, strengths, and weaknesses, giving you a diverse set of options to build your army and conquer your enemies.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail - Pocotone Pack
description: Meet the collaboration pack between 「Sixtar Gate: STARTRAIL」 and AfreecaTV's virtual BJ crew 'POKOTONE'! This DLC includes a total of 10 new songs and 9 new emotes.

name: Luminous Skies: A Short Adventure DLC
description: Adds a few more missions. More characters to select for the party. More classes available for Briar.

name: Pinball Arena
description: Pinball Arena is a game that shoots marbles to destroy bricks, using the cooperation between marbles to destroy falling bricks and defeat powerful bosses. In this game you need not only aiming, but deck construction, you can understand it as a card meat pigeon game, but the cards become marbles.

name: Effugium
description: Explore a cold, abandoned, and dreary facility to piece together its mysteries and find a means for escape from the horror that lurks within.

name: Slinger
description: Slinger features a web-sling and web-shoot mechanic that allows for more fun and interactive ways to battle enemies and move around the terrain.

name: Luminous Skies: A Short Adventure
description: A free-to-play turn based RPG. Explore the world and fight challenging battles. Play fun mini games. Gather food and cook it.

name: Rec: Beyond The Lens
description: Rec: Beyond The Lens is a first-person horror game that tells the story of an unresolved past, with realistic graphics. Explore an unknown location, investigating dark secrets while using a body camera to document every step

name: Kooky Kids Fort Defense
description: Tower Defense x Roguelite! Recruit Kids with branching upgrade paths, buy powerful Items, and earn randomized strategic Perks to defend your Fort against the Brats! Various challenging environments, Brats, and Bosses await you and the Kooky Kids.

name: Chronicles of the Soulforged
description: Chronicles of the Soulforged(“CotS”) is a card-based strategy game that combines strategy, deck building, and realtime combat. Build your deck with powerful combinations and free the soulforged's from its remorese by crashing its enemies!

name: Twist & Turn
description: A puzzle-platformer game in which your character is always rotating

name: StarOS
description: Tired of only seeing text on your personal computer? Get ready to make the leap to the graphic dimension with this new OS, the future is now!

name: Cubic Survivor
description: Cubic Survivor is an isometric action roguelike with a minimalist graphic style. Survive waves of enemies for as long as you can.

name: Knights of Braveland: Around the World Pack
description: Around the World Pack offers you a whole bunch of in-game items from all over the world. Most of the new equipment will be available in the first locations, so you will encounter interesting combinations from the very beginning.

name: Last Survivors
description: In the game, you will experience an incredibly satisfying adrenaline rush that will leave you wanting more. However, be sure not to harm innocent humans in the zombie horde. Survive in the post-apocalyptic world, show off your amazing shooting skills, and become the last survivor!

name: Hoboman
description: Hoboman is a 2d sci-fi platformer with retro graphics and a wacky story. Play as Pluto the Voltran as you travel across the galaxy and thwart the evil Syndicat organization!

name: Hi-Fi Rush: Traditional Garb Costume Pack
description: Fit out the Hi-Fi RUSH gang with looks inspired by the past with the Traditional Garb Costume Pack! Rockstars don't always wear ripped jeans, you know.

name: HardBoiledFarm
description: Random item defense game where every second counts! The ants are coming, and I forgot the recipe! The house is exploding! The leaf armor is lacking! Can we really finish farming this year?

name: Reaper's Isle
description: The ancient island beckons in this open-world, stealth horror game. Search for your missing daughter while avoiding dangerous phantom creatures. Restore power across the island to access the lab in the island's depths where you'll discover the fate of your missing daughter.

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Pro Mod Pack 2
description: This Pro Mod Pack includes (2) Pro Modified type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars, and (2) Radial 315 versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars. The Pro Mods are the fastest door cars and include engine swaps for domestic engines.

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Pro Mod Pack 1
description: This Pro Mod Pack includes (2) Pro Modified type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars, and (2) Radial 315 versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars. The Pro Mods are the fastest door cars and include engine swaps for domestic engines.

name: Arcadium: Space Odyssey
description: Embark on an interstellar roguelite adventure set in a procedurally generated universe! Battle relentless alien horders, strategically enhance your build, harness planetary resources, and journey across the vastness of space to reveal its hidden secrets.

name: Parsec Lost in Space
description: Dodge! Speed up! Destroy! Here you will have to challenge yourself to the maximum in order to defeat all the challenges and leave in one piece. Relying only on your reflexes and the movement of your ship, you will have to face everything from asteroids to giant robots!!!

name: Purrfectly Hidden Cats: Kittenwood
description: Dive into 'Purrfectly Hidden Cats - Kittenwood', an engaging hidden object game brimming with elusive cats, interactive elements, and captivating mini-stories. Venture beyond whiskers in a world rich with surprises and discover the wonders of Kittenwood!

name: Unearth
description: Dig for the bones of your creators in this mashup of Bomberman, Digdug, and Lemmings.

name: Covid 23: Test Labs
description: Infiltrate hazardous facilities, plant explosives, gather vital evidence, and save survivors while battling against nightmarish mutations. Brace yourself for an intense and action-packed mission to overcome the unexpected horrors that await.

name: Pinging
description: Pinging, is a solo simulation bouncing ball on a paddle, suits all ages

name: A Dark Room
description: Critically acclaimed, minimalist text-based rpg. Come light the fire.

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Summer Slices Set - Summer 2023
description: Bite into a slice of summer with these!

name: Lofi Ball: Dessert
description: This DLC contains 2 skins (Donut) (Wreath), and 10 new levels (Dessert)

name: Idle Champions: Mythic Freely Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Freely (if you don't already own them) Mythic Freely Skin An Epic Feat for Freely 7 Gold Freely Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: The Way of Wine
description: Immerse yourself in "The Way of Wine" a visual novel of medieval fantasy and romance. Determine the fate of Ethan, the heir of the vineyards, as you encounter three enchanting girls. Your choices shape the storyline, creating a captivating romantic journey!

name: PainFighting
description: 《Pain Fighting》, Good Business is a 2.5D horizontal board arcade fighting game. There are cute pixel characters and funny plot. Unlock skills and kills through directional command input. Join us now on this relaxing and enjoyable journey!

name: Inn The Dark
description: You have been sent to aid in a Triple Homicide case. But you soon find that things are not as they seem. Inn This first person horror game you must investigate the strange super natural on goings in a haunted hotel. Run and hide from danger using only a Flashlight and Camera!

name: Andara: Rise for Rebellion
description: Ordon's armies have invaded Hailstone and are plundering their resources. Become Andara, the tyrant's daughter, in this frenetic third-person shooter. Engage enemy weak points and move fast in a brief yet intense single-player campaign. Rise for rebellion.

name: Return
description: A game where you defeat aliens in a space station contaminated by alien invasion and solve puzzles to escape to Earth.

name: Mask: Beyond Lies
description: Transported in in another world, a masked person guide you through the day to the exit to go back to your world. But will it really be this easy ? Mask - Beyond is an Otome game that features four love interests.

name: Sages Of Kaboom
description: A fantasy and funny schmup game, with a retro vibe within. The player controls a fighter jet plane which shoots unlimited laser pellets and limited rocket ammo, which deals double damage to bosses.

name: Ladderway
description: Ladderway is a challenging 2D arcade game where you take the position of Jim, a man trying to climb up a building through several ladders while avoiding Mr. Mica's flowerpots as well as other obstacles.

name: Last Hopeless
description: Killis hundreds of zombie and get new reinforcement items for survivng. choose your best item set and upgrade them to get hidden skill. Last Hopeless is a rogue-like game with a light physics feed back, you can play with gun, hammer, kitchen knife and other hundreds of items to survival longer.

name: Stupid Camera
description: It's an endless run game, a very simple game. In the game, the player's goal is to run many distances and reach the final score.

name: PongBall
description: Do you remember one of the first game in the world ever made? We (re)made it in modern way! Use skills, open cases, get new skins, beat your opponents, play with your friends and much more in PongBall!

name: Jeepney Simulator
description: Embrace your inner jeepney driver! Pick up passengers, calculate change, and weave through traffic in this Filipino-made driving game. Feed your family, customize your jeepneys, and unlock more rides! Don't forget to bring your towel!

name: The Dungeon Tower
description: Can you beat The Dungeon Tower? A Fun roguelike where you can select one of the heroes to battle against the tower. Increase your level, gain new skills and complete quests to personalize your hero to kill the lord! Try and die in this journey until you can get stronger power ups to beat the game!

name: Looper Looper
description: Looper Looper is a simple clicker game. Click on the requested items, transport them, earn ∮ and upgrade your factory!

name: Chosen Angels
description: Chosen Angels is a side scroller game where you have to play as an angel, who must cope with not an easy job. Need to have time to deliver all the angels on the right path. The color of their wings corresponds to their color of the door. Do not hesitate, with time there will be a lot of them.

name: My Eggs
description: My Eggs - Side-view game with a physical world, where the player by controlling the direction of the wind moves objects in the game, as well as the main character, who must collect all the eggs and deliver to the destination.

name: Prop Game
description: Play as a chair, a wizard's hat, a magnet and much more! You can then challenge your friends to solo or team mini-games.

name: RollerCoaster Tycoon Adventures Deluxe
description: Adventure and family fun await! Build over 200 wacky rides, coasters, shops and more.

name: The Game of Life 2: El Dorado
description: Set off on a jungle adventure and grow through every decision. Hop in your Car, Paddle Boat or Copter. Take control as a Map Maker or see what life brings as a Path Finder. Find the Golden City and discover that the legend of El Dorado lives on!

name: Royal Romances: The Power of Chosen One DLC
description: Explore additional locations and achieve new goals! Travel to a wonderful world of magic and learn more about its inhabitants!

name: EZ2on Reboot: R - Fortress Collaboration DLC
description: FORTRESS Collaboration is the DLC for EZ2ON REBOOT : R.

name: Drevepsina
description: Combat focused minimalist RTS

name: VR Tribes: The VR Edition
description: VR vs PC. Show which player is stronger. VR TRIBES is an action-packed online multiplayer battle. One in VR and up to three as PC players. As VR player you have to conquer the island. The PC players have to join together to attack and defeat the VR player.

name: DriftHub
description: Enter the world of DRIFTHUB: Enjoy driving and simulation. Have a pleasant time with your friends.

name: Split Square
description: Split Square is a deck building rogue-like game featuring cute pixel characters. Defeat all enemies in a random block space and collect rewards to build a stronger deck!

name: To The Sky
description: To the Sky is an exhilarating action-adventure game where your goal is to reach the sky by overcoming obstacles and scaling towering walls. Be prepared to start anew if you fall while ascending. Challenge yourself, ascend higher, and uncover the mysteries above the clouds in To the Sky.

name: TerraCodex: The Stolen Relics
description: In Monte Carlo, powerful relics were stolen from the TerraCodex foundation. The infamous 40 Thieves seem to be behind the heist. As the mastermind behind the investigation, you will manage agents and resources to overcome challenges and catch thieves - each with a particular set of skills.

name: TheFighters: NewBlood
description:
Improvements in the game graphics which make the game more playable than before,
most things changed in-game
- adding a Cut Scene
- HDR + 4k
- Player movements
with my previous game the player was just jumping with one animation, Now all movement animations added
- AI bot more intelligent than before
- Camera position
- Sounds effects

name: Gerda: A Flame in Winter - The Resistance Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Castle Crashers & Pit People Bundle
description: A kaleidoscope of colorful combat, enjoy two of The Behemoth's couch co-op adventures in one lovingly wrapped package!

name: Candleman Complete Journey Bundle with Wenjia
description: One of our best-selling game Wenjia is now added into Candleman Definitive Edition with no additional charge!

name: WorldNeverland: Daily Life in the Elnea Kingdom - Pioneer Summer Outfit Set: Citrus
description:
Comes with:
- Pioneer Summer Outfit: Citrus "Refreshingly cool summer wear often seen around the Nak Peninsula's southern frontier."
- Summer Pioneer Kid's Wear: Cit "Refreshingly cool kid's summer wear often seen around the Nak Peninsula's southern frontier."

name: The Grinch: Christmas Adventures
description: The Grinch has had a wonderful, awful idea – steal all the presents in Who-ville, using gadgets like his stealthy Santa costume and Candy Cane Lasso. Help him sneak around, freeze creatures with snowballs, and learn the meaning of Christmas along the way, in this festive platformer!

name: Mechanic 8230: Escape From Ilgrot - Ultimate Edition
description: Mechanic 8230: Escape from Ilgrot is a puzzle point & click adventure, set in the ruined city of Ilgrot. Use anything you can find to progress through the story.

name: Urban Flow: Ultimate DLC Pack
description:
Content included in collection:

- Expansion Pack
- Winter Expansion Pack
- London Rules
- Streets Supplement

name: Mystical Mixing: Complete Edition
description:
Enter a world of magic and wonder with Mystical Mixing.
Pour the potion into the cauldron, throw in the clover, bone and feather, stir and voila - you have a cute Mixie!

Combine other ingredients to create Mixies with different features: winged, horned, spotted, furry... the possibilities are endless.

name: Urban Flow: Summer Edition
description: Immerse yourself in a beautiful, hand-crafted, low-poly world to discover the enormous satisfaction of watching the hundreds of tiny, colorful cars flowing through the streets – all while listening to the chill, urban music.

name: Amaze! Relax Edition
description:
Lets pop & move the ball and paint - you’ve got to color and paint your way across the AMAZE maze puzzles.

Watch out! AMAZE gets harder as you play, color and paint the maze, and fill in puzzles!

Painting the maze puzzles sounds easy, but you have to be super strategic to color and fill every square.

name: Colormitation
description:
Fun and addictive puzzle game! Mix and Match Colors! Infinite Gameplay!

Arcade Mode:
Race against the time to match your canvas with an automatically generated one. Complete the canvas as fast as you can to earn more points!

Practice Mode:
Play casually and take all the time you need when mixing and matching your colors on your canvas.

name: Arcade Archives: Pole Position
