description:
"POLE POSITION" is a racing game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1982.
The game is divided into qualifying and grand prix. If you make a lap in the qualifying round with a good time, you will advance to the grand prix.
Use your driving technique to win the POLE POSITION!

name: Fastest on the Buzzer
description: Sin descripción

description: A golf game that you can enjoy, like playing a puzzle. That's "Side View Golf".

description: B3RN1 (Bernie) is a patrol bot with the Intergalactic Federation, tasked with keeping the galaxy safe from would-be villains. After receiving a distress signal from Galactic Blast Ranger Pink, B3RN1 changes course to investigate planet Cretacia.

Get to the next level, fail, try again, fail again, try again, and finally reach the next checkpoint-- twelve times. It all makes you wonder... what's in store at the end?

name: Puzzle Go

name: Killing Dreamworks
description: It's a murderous adventure filled with whimsy, grotesque ghosts and high-powered weapons. Find your AI teammates and form a powerful fighting squad. Draw your cards to get powerful props and skills. Collect all kinds of materials and fight against the tide of monsters hunting.

Fight off the friars who come to capture the alien, find and destroy the portal guarded by the friars to achieve the final victory of the game.

description: ”Grandma's Cane” is a 3D personal development survival lawn mowing game that gradually strengthens by continuously developing enough resources and props in the early stages, and ultimately battles against the boss.

name: Infiltrating a Cult: Additional All-Ages Story & Graphics DLC
description: "Additional All-Ages Story & Graphics DLC" is you can play the game that graphics and story without adult contents for all-ages.

name: Gondola's Adventure: Single Player & Local Multiplayer
description: Lead Gondola on an adventure, climbing between the depths of the earth to the skies. Just remember to watch your step along the way.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Faroe Islands XP
description: Up high in the Northern Atlantic Ocean, between Iceland, Norway, and Great Britain, lie the Faroe Islands - an archipelago of 18 islands. Here, helicopters are important for traffic in areas that buses and ferries do not reach, while visitors from abroad arrive at Vágar Airport.

name: News Reacts: Mission Impossible 2
description: Four more News Reacts missions.

name: Alien IQ Exam: Human Edition, Phase 1
description: Challenge yourself with a variety of puzzles in your quest to pass the Alien IQ Exam.

name: Russpuppy Kid Books
description: Your child will explore interactive stories, enjoy engaging reading games, and even bring their own book to life. Foster creativity, vocabulary, and a love for learning. Encourage the budding reader and writer in your young one. Experience the thrill of learning!

name: Royal Romances: The Power of Chosen One - Collector's Edition
description: The important thing in life is to be able to let go of the past and always be open to an uncharted future. Could you embrace your destiny and save the kingdom?

name: Jitsuroku Powerful Yakyuuken: Slugger Yamada
description: Sin descripción

name: Real Truck Driver Simulator USA
description: Drive a real truck in Real Truck Driver Simulator USA! Become an American truck driver, and show your driving skills. Choose cargo and drive it to transport it to city warehouses. Upgrade your truck for better driving and to earn more money. Fix and refuel an American truck at service stations and fuel stations. Avoid driving cargo above the speed limit, and follow driving rules for the transport. Spend money wisely and enjoy the day and night driving experience.

name: Boat Trip
description: Drive a boat to earn coins and buy a new better boats. Live longer to earn bigger score.

name: Everlune
description: A platforming game that takes place on the Moon, where the player goes through the mysterious red portals back and forth between parallel worlds to solve the puzzles and find collectibles.

name: Toons Kart
description: Sin descripción

name: Adolf Hitler RPG: Last Minutes of the Millennium Empire
description: Adolf Hitler RPG: Last Minutes of the Millennium Empire is a simple and short game where you get to put an end to the man who initiated World War II.

description: A magical girl is suddenly teleported to an ancient enchanted forest filled with licking dogs. The magic maiden can only use magic to pull them in order not to be licked.

name: Boreal Tenebrae: Deluxe Premium Edition
description: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

description: You'll be able to chat with attractive girls, know their engaging storylines, receive spicy pictures, and solve Match-3 Puzzles to unlock new and cool pick-up lines for your waifu!

A shy protagonist undergoes an intense training for his first kiss!!
Everything for the sake of the one he loves...

description: Kaoruko joins the nerd club full of boys so that she can receive attention from them. An nerdy princess with a strong need for approval goes wild!

name: Don't Lie Pack 2
description: Collection of epic games where sincerity is the key to conquer Do you dare to face this memorization game?

name: QUByte Classics: Risky Woods
description: Fortunately, you - the young warrior Rohan - have arrived to deliver justice to the evil hordes. With weapons in hand you must enter the risky woods and free the monks from their petrified captivity. Only when you've set the monks free and sent Draxos back to hell will wisdom be restored for good.

name: Eroblast: 24 Hot Waifus
description:
24 Hot Waifus includes:
- Playful Pack
- Spicy Pack
- Passion Pack

name: Eroblast: Spicy Pack
description: In Spicy Pack you get up to 10+ hours of new gameplay, more flirting and pics thanks to 80 new levels and 8 new girls:

description: In Playful Pack you get up to 10+ hours of new gameplay, more flirting and pics thanks to 80 new levels and 8 new girls.

name: Haunted House
description: As can be inferred from the title, Haunted House is a Halloween themed escape game, though it is not particularly scary due to the child friendly art style and lack of jump scares, etc. The game was developed by KMart and features links to their website to buy Halloween costumes of various characters that are found in the game.

name: Polar Pool
description: Chalk up your cue and play some pool - just watch out for airborne penguins! Play classic games like 8 and 9-ball, or use power-ups, bonus pockets, and special characters to master the game.

name: Paperboy
description: Sega Genesis port of Paperboy.

name: Paperboy
description: Game Gear port of Paperboy

name: Don’t Let It Out
description:
There’s something in your bathroom. No matter what you do, don’t let it out.

Don't Let It Out is a short horror game that takes about 10-30 minutes. It is connected another game "From the Sun to the Moon" but it isn't necessary to play that one first to enjoy this one. The main character is nonbinary and uses they/them pronouns.

name: Paperboy
description: Master System port of Paperboy.

name: Paperboy
description: NES port of Paperboy.

name: From the Sun to the Moon
description: Soleil (pronounced “soh-lay”) and her girlfriend Esmeray (pronounced “ehz-mer-ay”) have been together for almost three years! Leading up to their third year anniversary, Soleil decides the best way to celebrate would be to take Esmeray out on a date each day leading up to their anniversary! Will the dates be successful, or end in total failure? Play now to find out!

name: Paperboy
description: The object of Paperboy is to deliver papers to your customers while inflicting as much damage as possible to the houses of your non-customers. To make things more difficult, numerous obstacles get in your way including construction workers, rogue tires, skateboarders, dogs and cats, cars, and even the occasional tornado.

name: Paperboy
description: Game Boy Color port of Paperboy.

name: Jet Dragon
description:
JET DRAGON is a "Race Dragon Nurturing Simulation". Manage your team, train dragons and riders, and win races with unique strategies!

Step through space and time into the world of Venerusa, where dragon racers soar the skies.

name: Light Heroes
description: A side scrolling shoot-em-up with a feudal Japanese, mythological/sci-fi aesthetic.

name: Fear Unlimited
description: A side-scrolling beat-'em-up heavily inspired by the Devil May Cry franchise.

name: Blood on the Clocktower
description:
Blood on the Clocktower is a game of murder and mystery, lies and logic, deduction and deception for five-to-twenty courageous players and one devious storyteller.

A social game played in person or online, seated in a circle, each player receives either a ‘good’ or ‘evil’ token with their unique character on it. Good players share information to solve the mystery whilst evil players lie about who they are and what they know. The good team wins if they can piece together their knowledge, trust each other, and execute the demon. The evil team wins if the demon can sow distrust, evade detection, and wipe out the village.

name: Untitled Black Panther Game
description:
As announced during the 57th anniversary celebration of the character, the first project for EA's novel studio, Cliffhanger Games, will be an original, third-person, single-player Black Panther game in collaboration with Marvel Games. The stated mission is to build an expansive and reactive world that empowers players to experience what it is like to take on the mantle of Wakanda’s protector, the Black Panther.

Game lead Kevin Stephens announced, “We’re dedicated to delivering fans a definitive and authentic Black Panther experience, giving them more agency and control over their narrative than they have ever experienced in a story-driven video game. Wakanda is a rich Super Hero sandbox, and our mission is to develop an epic world for players who love Black Panther and want to explore the world of Wakanda as much as we do.”

name: EA Sports FC 24
description: EA SPORTS FC 24 is the ultimate football simulation game that lets you play as your favourite stars and teams in the most authentic and immersive way possible. With EA SPORTS FC, you can experience the thrill of the world's biggest competitions, such as the Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Women's Champions League, La Liga Santander, Bundesliga, Ligue 1, Serie A, CONMEBOL Libertadores, Barclays Women's Super League, NWSL and many more. EA SPORTS FC 24 also features a new brand identity inspired by the triangles that have been part of EA SPORTS football for the past 30 years, from the isometric polygons that make up the game to the chemistry triangles that exist in Ultimate Team to the player indicator across every match. Join the Club and be part of a new Football Club for the future of football we want to build together.

name: Stark Tower Defense
description:
Oh no! The town is under attack in the Stark Tower Defense game. The Marvel superheroes have no other choice but to do their best to stop the villains from conquering their headquarters. The Stark Tower is the only thing keeping them close, so they have to defend it at any price.

There are various defenses you can opt for when protecting the city. Each one is based on one hero's superpower. It is on you to be the strategical mastermind behind the defense line. Without your bird's eye view of the problem, these superheroes will be lost!

name: Pump It Up Phoenix
description: Pump it Up Phoenix 2023 arcade dance machine offers the most updated dance machine yet, with over 150 K-pop, original and new music. The PIU series also offers new steps and scoring changes.

name: Minecraft: Better than Adventure!
description: Better than Adventure is a mod for Minecraft Beta 1.7.3. It was originally intended to add a few new features for a personalised experience, but has since grown into a full-fledged fork of Minecraft, adding dozens of new features for players to enjoy. Its philosophy is to add new gameplay that enhances and improves on the existing aspects of the game, without drastically changing the core experience. The question we like to ask ourselves is, "Would Mojang have added this to the vanilla game back in 2011?" If the answer is yes, it's probably a good candidate for BTA.

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 1 Ultimate Pass
description: The Year 1 Ultimate Pass includes 4 new characters, 3 outfits with colors 1-10 for the new characters, 2 additional stages and 7,700 Drive tickets (in-game currency).

name: Fear Underground
description: Left alone with the horror of the dungeon, the main character must uncover its secret. It is he who will become not only a test of strength and endurance, but also a guiding thread leading to the unraveling of the unknown forces guarding this secret.

name: Homeworld: Raider Retreat
description: Homeworld: Raider Retreat is a promotional version of Homeworld that was made available through the pre-order version of Homeworld: Cataclysm. The game added an additional mission, along with the first four missions, focusing primarily on the Turanic Raiders, which was cut from the original game for unknown reasons. None of these missions are available in Homeworld: Cataclysm.

name: Tomb of Dread
description: A first-person horror game with emphasis on survival, resource managment and exploration. Trapped below the Egyiptian sands you must find a way out. It's an immersive horror experiance that will leave you with nightmares.

name: Mage Mayhem
description: Mage Mayhem is a team-based strategy game where you can compete in up to 4v4 battles with your friends competing across different game modes and maps to prove who is the best mage. Customize your character with many different classes, abilities, and perks to fit your playstyle.

name: Shuvani
description: Shuvani is an isometric roguelite with a Romani-inspired aesthetic, where action and strategy complement each other in a system of magic related to music. Will you be able to escape from the forest?

name: Bionic Momentum
description: A hardcore old school 2D physics-based sci-fi action puzzle platformer, with an emphasis on retaining speed and momentum

name: Shan Hai Express
description: Step aboard Shan Hai Express and experience an fantasy journey through the world of the ancient Chinese mythology Shan Hai Jing ( 山海经 ). This is an interactive narrative game inspired by the nonlinear structure of the text of "Shan Hai Jing".

name: Cabezurrio vs Robots
description: Platform game in which we control Cabezurrio, a soldier who must collect all the gems and destroy all the robots in its path in several different scenarios. We have a rifle with which to shoot the robots.

name: CometSoldier
description: "Comet Soldier" is a 2D top-down view action shooting game. Advance through the battlefield and defeat the bosses that await.

name: Gold Rush
description: A visual novel styled choice game where you decide the ending

name: Battle Support: Ultimate Edition
description: The three factions fight for the entire area, build your own army and your two opponents to compete for the area and seize the enemy's supplies You can manage the supplies and troops in your own area Use vehicles and military technology to support your troops and obtain victory.

name: Battle Support: Deluxe Edition
description: The three factions fight for the entire area, build your own army and your two opponents to compete for the area and seize the enemy's supplies You can manage the supplies and troops in your own area Use vehicles and military technology to support your troops and obtain victory.

name: BitterSweet Detectives' Tea Party
description: Bittersweet -Detectives' Tea Party- is an adventure-mystery visual novel game, tracking down the cases left by a mysterious phantom thief named “Beneatha”. It is a tale about seeking the truth, with a bitter and sweet journey.

name: Rise of Block
description: Rise of Block is an endless game where you avoid obstacles trying to beat your high score.

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - Hakon Bundle
description: Become the fierce nightrunner hellbent on survival with the new Hakon Bundle. Arm yourself with charm, wit, and the tools necessary to navigate through the treacherous nights of The City.

name: Rescue To The Parallel
description: Collect allies and weapons in parallel worlds and defeat thousands of enemies. Rescue to the Parallel is a new roguelike game. Rescue characters to make friends, search for weapons and treasure chests. The route you choose extends your survival time infinitely.

name: Yappie! Knockout
description: You can play with up to 24 players simultaneously across 13 levels. It's time to call your friends and use your running, jumping, and other skills to win in Yappie!

name: HamsterBall Soccer
description: Hamsterball Soccer is a funny football game with simple mechanics. Challenge the AI or your friends in two modes where you can play with up to 8 players in 18 levels with its own unique characteristics. Share your controllers to play with a maximum number of players. A game for the whole family.

name: Video Editor's Toolkit
description: Take on the role of Mark Brown and edit the GMTK video of the best games of this year's jam! Watch out though, because the video editing software is misbehaving a bit today... it may get a bit puzzly!

name: Making the Game
description: become the developer. create your masterpiece. sell a quadrillion copies.

name: Underlevel
description: Underlevel is a game where you play as a horde of skeletons while a player is raiding the dungeon, trying to get as much XP as they can so they level up and potentially kill the boss at the end - it's your job to stop that from happening. Try your best to rescue all the skeletons, destroy all the loot and keep the player from levelling up before they make it to the final floor.

name: Pãozito
description: In the game, you help a magical bun named Pãozito pop balloons and dodge traps so you can earn resources to save the Breakfast Kingdom. It has hundreds of levels filled with a wide variety of trap combinations that will challenge your skills. Each level may need a different strategy, but that's up to you!

name: Maple Winters in Leafbud Rampage!!
description: An action roguelite horde survival game about Maple Winters.

name: Ednaldo Pereira: Mobile
description: Ednaldo Pereira: Mobile is a captivating platform game inspired by platforming classics that offers an engaging and challenging gaming experience. Explore different stages filled with obstacles, enemies, and treasures to unlock. Overcome thrilling challenges, collect golden notes, and improve your skills while enjoying vibrant graphics and an exciting soundtrack with remixes of Ednaldo's classics.

name: Wyrmicide: Tombstone Die
description: Unlock the Tombstone die to let loose the living dead! This DLC allows you to bring the Tombstone die into any battle. It offers new pieces and buffs, and its offerings may be purchased by either player in a match.

name: Ascending Inferno
description:
Ascending Inferno is your ultimate goal in this gorgeous, challenging-but-fair 2.5D precision platformer with a ball.

Playing as Dani, it’s not enough to run, jump and platform your way out of Hell - you’ll need to dribble, kick and header her dead brother Vincent’s ball-shaped soul along with you!

Just be sure you don’t fumble the ball - the depths of Hell is a long way to fall…

name: I Hate Colors
description:
I Hate Colors
The Pixel-blob hates all colors other than White.
Go on an endless mission to gobble all the colors that come in the way of the hungry angry Pixel-blob.
Its not easy to catch all of them, the mission gets tougher and puzzlingly awesome as you keep playing.
Enjoy a brain rattler anytime when you want a break.
Go Get It..!

name: Motor World: Bike Factory
description: Produce uncommon motorcycles, make up unique models, make your workers happy, build and upgrade your shops, please demanding clients, and challenge your friends in races!

name: RC Club: AR Racing Simulator
description: RC Club is a physically realistic simulation of a radio-controlled car: it performs just like it would in the real world! Mind the gravity, control the speed and acceleration and don’t forget about the weight of your car, the friction it makes on the ground, the forces that affect your vehicle, and check how the lights and shadows interact with your surroundings too!

name: Space Run: Adventure Above Sky
description:
Space Run Epic! Sling Escape will take you to an epic cosmic adventure. Fly away from the Earth and visit multiple planets in the quickest way possible. Can you bend the laws of physics and escape velocity?
Tap to blast off your space pod and leave planet Earth in this addictive casual runner game. Rockets doesn't work anymore and you are getting trained to fly a space pod to travel across the galaxy! Your adrenaline level will be on an all-time high when you dodge incoming asteroids and collect bonus points from black holes. We hope you are up for sleepless nights in this addictive action game orbiting planets and more!

name: Geometry Curling
description: Geometry Curling is a game like curling, but using polygons/circles as pucks : move your polygons/circles close to the target, move closer than computer's one! Besides battling with computer, you may also watch 2 computers playing together!

name: Raising Archangel
description: Minimize taps and clicks! Let's have fun thanks to an easy and fast progress!

name: Becoming Bytes
description: Reminisce the moment when you first raised and played with virtual monsters, now on your mobile phone with music composed by award-winning Kentaro Sato aka Ken-P.

name: Real Car Parking Master
description: Real Car Parking : Parking Master is realistic driving experience which will take you to another level! Test your car driving skills with many features like interior view, realistic sound effects, different cars and big cities. Show that you are Parking Master like a boss !

name: Race Pro
description:
Race Pro is an endless racing game with incredible graphics and realistic driving control, in a city.
Drive car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones.
Complete career mode to show off your amazing car driving skills, and become the best professional driver.

name: Sky High Golf
description:
Playing mini golf in the sky adds new challenges to the game because you will need to keep the ball on the platform. Sure there are some walls to bounce off, but it is the areas between this you will need to be careful of. Don’t Fall Off!
There are over 190 levels to play through. These levels are broken up into 4 different courses, Start Course, Long Course, Star Course and Village Course.

name: Echo_Squadrons
description: The story is simple... You are the Commander in charge of a powerful Starship Carrier. Your mission is to move deep into the far reaches to space to explore the source of strange enemy ships. Those enemy ships have repeatedly attacked and destroyed exploration ships sent in search of resources need to ensure the human race's survival.

name: CatJump
description:
How high can you get?
Become a cat, use various tools, defeat monsters, complete missions and unlock themes to enjoy new costumes!

name: Rally Clash
description: Jump, drift and pass your way through challenging tracks in the only mobile game based entirely on the thrilling sport of rallycross, where car racing meets motocross! One-handed thumb-swipe steering makes playing simple, but beating others to the finish line is a more difficult task.

name: Robot Shooter
description:
Test your reflexes in this action-packed, physics-based shooter! Dodge bullets and blast your way through enemies.
Watch how you destroy robots, piece by piece. Then collect those pieces and upgrade your weaponry to blast even more bots!
Sound fun? You bet it is!

name: Tales of Dragon
description: Tales of Dragon is an MMORPG adventure set in a world of powerful dragons. Explore a vast map, team up with other players, and take on these mighty beasts to uncover ancient secrets. Will you become a legendary dragon slayer?

name: Banana Cat Jump
description:
Save Banana Cat.
Banana Cat keeps crying and needs saving. Jump to get to the top and make Banana Cat happy.

name: Forgotten
description: Welcome to an epic adventure in a CYOF (Choose Your Own Fantasy), DnD-inspired (Dungeons and Dragons) RPG (Role-Playing Game) on your mobile device! In this immersive game, you play as a half-elf, navigating through a classic RPG world filled with danger, mystery, and excitement.

name: Reverb Arcade
description: In the ever-changing battleground of Reverb, can you keep up with the multiplying threats? Surviving won't be as easy as it seems, especially when echoes morphs into a new enemy. We invite you to a vibrant neon world, where a bounce can reverberate into a new challenge

name: Cafe Master Story
description:
Have you ever wanted to run your own coffee shop?
The smell of fresh roast beans, the gurgling of the espresso machine, the sheen of a squeaky-clean counter... All this and more await you in this quirky sim game!
Just set up your tables and counter seats, and wait for the customers to come rolling in. Add handy features like magazine racks, or chic furnishings to give your cafe a more welcoming atmosphere.

name: Age of Bingo: World Tour
description:
Age of Bingo: World Tour is a new twist on the classic bingo game.
You can use various items to complete overalls bingo with the goal of coloring all the numbers on the bingo card.
With the points you earn from playing bingo, you can visit cities around the world and build different landmarks.
Each city has its own theme and background music to make your trip more enjoyable and relaxing.

name: World of Smile
description:
Why don't these cute creatures ever smile? They need more sweets to build the tallest tower in this amazing new world. And this is not casual - after all, they decided to go into outer space!
Use the non-smiling creatures' springy arms to collect all the sweets using the drag and drop mechanics. Build the highest tower - and finally let them see space.

name: Bird And Words: Find Word
description: Embark on a captivating word-filled adventure with "Bird and Words: Find Word," a casual and strategic word game that will test your reflexes and vocabulary skills! Get ready to guide our charming bird through a perilous journey filled with words, spikes, and exciting challenges.

name: Magnetic Merge: Number Master
description:
Merge numbers by adding tiles with the same number to the field next to already placed tiles (vertically or horizontally).
Each merge will create a new tile with a number one higher.

name: Disrepair
description: Disrepair is a atmospheric horror mod that focuses around a lone combine hazmat worker. They have been dispatched to the radioactive ruins of Black Mesa to photograph visual evidence of the anomalies located in the faclity's office complex. Can they make it out unharmed?

name: Marathon: Resurrection
description: he Marathon: Resurrection project is breathing new, fully 3D life into an old 2.5D action game. With the advanced 3D capabilities of today's graphics cards, Marathon can become an even more visually-stunning and addictive game. The vessel for this rebirth: Unreal Tournament.

name: Tower of Fantasy
description:
Embark together on your fantasy adventure!

Set hundreds of years in the future on the distant planet of Aida, the shared open-world MMORPG, anime-infused sci-fi adventure Tower of Fantasy PlayStation, developed by Hotta Studio and Published by Perfect World Games will soon be on PlayStation globally. Players will be able to experience an anime-inspired post-apocalyptic sci-fi art style, freeform character development, and exciting combat through thrilling battles and exciting open-world exploration.

name: Persona 5 Tactica: Launch Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Iron Hopper
description: Just tap to hop! Double tap for a double hop, but don’t get too hop happy (hoppy?) or your run will end faster than you thought. You will receive daily rewards and coins just for opening the app every 6 hours and you will have the unique chance of unlocking 30 different characters with the coins you earn. When you realize you can’t earn coins because you suck at the game, you can always buy some through the in-app purchases!

name: Cookery
description:
Our Chef will teach you how to cook amazing dishes!
Don't be afraid to get fat because he uses only fresh and healthy products.
Cook everything you want - sandwiches, soups, light salads and even jam.

name: ZenDots 2: One Dot's Journey
description:
Find some chaotic serenity, with ZenDots 2! Sprint your way through mazes, paths, and other diverse creations, while avoiding devious obstacles designed to stop you. Choose your path wisely!
Swipe anywhere on the screen to propel the white dot through each of the 48 handcrafted levels. Knock over blocks, pop dots, and collect rings to complete each level’s mission. Only then will the exit be revealed. Dash to the finish to get the fastest time!

name: Treasures Boom
description:
Jack, the sea cadet caught in the sea bottle with a map which shows the plan of the island, where pirates hid treasures. He has no doubt for one instant, he is going to find all these treasures.
Great adventures are waiting for you, where you have to help Jack and solve a lot of puzzles.

name: Mythos Quest
description: Play as Aladdin, the brave young man with the flying carpet; Luca, the good witch from the forests of the west; Rumpelstiltskin, the dwarf with the golden touch; Valkyrie, the winged warrior from the Land Beyond; and Hades, the grumpy but good-hearted Lord of the Underworld. Known as “the Legendary Five,” these ragtag heroes are the only ones that can save Mythos. Their quest is to chase after the dark wizard Morgana and recover the Vita Stone, an ancient crystal that provides safety and harmony to whoever controls it. Without the Stone, the Kingdom will not be able to protect itself against the dark forces of the universe. Eager to prove themselves, the Legendary Five have risen to the challenge and will not rest until the Kingdom is saved.

name: PBJ: The Sandwich
description: Have you ever wanted to make the biggest Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich in the world? Well now you can in PBJ : The Sandwich! Stack endless amounts peanut butter and jelly to build the biggest PBJ sandwich in the world!

name: 4 In a Row:Deluxe
description:
You can get so much fun from 4 in a Row - Deluxe!
4 in a Row is a two-player game and the object of the game is to connect four of one's own discs of the same color next to each other vertically, horizontally, or diagonally before your opponent. 3 AI levels of gameplay against the computer, or against your friend on same or different devices! This strategy board game let you keep having fun as well as improve your levels.

name: The Last Solver
description: Solving puzzles is all you need to save humanity.

name: Cell Corp
description: Get ready to defend your human body as a mob of virus is about to invade you. Use your finger to tap on the virus to smash and eliminate them before they pass your screen..Test your mastery of the game and win rewards coins which can upgrade skills your auxiliary-pets in the challenge event.Smash to “Defense war”!

name: Numb3r Catch3r
description: Have a blast building a building while learning some basic math at the same time. Use intuitive controls to become a master builder and an expert in math problems. Have fun competing in the global leaderboards to see who is the smartest of them all.

name: Dots & Boxes
description:
Are you looking for a game that brings absolute fun into your life? Well, we have got to tell you that we know about one such game! Want to know? It’s Dots & Boxes.
Dots & Boxes is a multiplayer game that reminds you of your golden childhood days. Yes, this is the very game that has played a big part in our school lives. We want you to hark back to your childhood by playing this game digitally which is created with appealing features and design.

name: Soccer Empire: The Dream Begins
description: Sin descripción

name: Cubes Control
description: Sin descripción

name: Streetball 2: On Fire
description: Sin descripción

name: EA Sports FC 24: Ultimate Edition
description: We welcomes you to The World's Game: the most true-to-football experience ever with HyperMotionV, PlayStyles optimised by Opta, and a revolutionised Frostbite Engine.

name: Rogue Egg: Hatch Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Enchanted Portals: Tales Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Stickman Fighter Infinity
description: Sin descripción

name: Gig Life Tycoon
description: Struggling to make ends meet in the urban jungle is tough, but when you're responsible for providing for your loved ones back home, the stakes are even higher. Welcome to our survival simulation game, where you take on the role of a migrant worker in a bustling metropolis. Day after day, you hustle to survive by taking on different gig jobs, each one bringing you closer to your goal of securing a better life for your family.

name: Torn
description: Sin descripción

name: Kingdom Adventurers
description:
A once-prosperous kingdom lies overrun by monsters and wreathed in an ominous fog.
Now is the time for the descendants of the king to take back this land.
Raise the kingdom from the dust and give birth to a new civilization!
Recruit warriors, mages, and other skilled adventurers to your cause.
Dispel the fog to open up new areas to explore.
Take a break in between battles to build up your town. Add Weapon Shops, Item Shops, Inns, and more!

name: Idle Aircraft Carrier
description: Sin descripción

name: Gylt: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Indiepocalypse #42
description: Issue #42 of a monthly indie game anthology collecting games from 10 developers.

name: Succubus: Hellish Orgy VR
description:
Delve into the depths of hell, where you will face an array of enticing challenges and encounters. The game deftly combines puzzle mechanics with meticulously crafted erotic scenes to deliver a unique gaming experience for mature audiences.

Succubus: Hellish Orgy VR invites the player into a visually stunning environment of unique atmosphere. The game deeply explores the abyss of desire, discussing dynamics of power and themes of submission, all woven into the game's hellish backdrop.

Immerse yourself in a world that breaks the boundaries of gaming and narrative. Succubus: Hellish Orgy VR is aimed at delivering a unique and captivating experience for players who appreciate adult content while maintaining artistic integrity.

name: Papaye Bang Bang VR
description: Papaye Bang Bang VR (PBBVR) is a first-person shooter game, playable alone or with friends, in which players compete with slingshots and special ammunition. The flashy colored maps and the set of burlesque characters are inspired by the American continent.

name: Parigami
description:
Come and join us on our cosy paper forest, where many new friends are looking forward to meet you! Every day is an adventure in the world of Parigami!
Slide rows and columns to match colourful animal pieces. Make your way through paper scenarios by matching fun animals and Paper Popper Boosters. Compete with your friends and win special bonus prizes in Parigami’s bonus mini-game!

name: Dimension Painter
description:
Escape the maze with dimension pencil and save the gnome's planet in crisis.
Through the map editor, you can create and share your own game. Make your own game using various triggers and blocks. And compete with others.
129 stages! Various level of difficulty! If it's too hard, don't worry. We have walk through also!

name: Snowboard Hero
description: Experience console-quality graphics, intuitive controls and top-notch sound in a stunning alpine setting and show the world that you are the undisputed Snowboard Hero.

name: Castlerama
description:
Castlerama takes you on a photorealistic walk through a beautiful, detailed and accurately lit 3D setting. Merging real and imaginary elements, it draws inspiration from the charming town of Assisi, in Italy. You are left to find your own way around by touch and sight alone. Exploring a whole world becomes a matter of lifting your fingers.
Our goal? To fool your eyes and brain considering it all real. When you go back with your memory to the day you first opened this Mentalbox, you will think it was you on the cobblestone, you in the alleys, you in the catacombs...

name: Pop Corny
description: His name is Corny... Pop Corny, and he loves popcorn! He has one dream, one goal, one vision... Can you feed him enough to progress to the next level? But be careful as hunger takes over and Corny starts to black out!

name: Racoon the Thief
description: Racoons are hungry and they are looking for food. The only way to get the food at the moment seems to be very difficult, now it is your job to help them to enter into the Big Fat Neighbor's house and...

name: Bike Rivals
description:
Are you ready to play the greatest motocross game ever?
Bike Rivals is a new and exciting physics based motocross game from Miniclip!
Be the most intense, competitive and quickest rider in order to get the 3 stars on all the levels, while enjoying the amazing bike physics and fast-paced gameplay! But this isn’t just about finishing each level...it’s about getting the fastest time! Try your best to beat the clock!

name: Drunk Trucker Joe 3D Truck Driving Race
description:
Alcohol, Trucks, Fat Trucker and a highway are simply things that do not go well together except in racing game.
Meet Joe, he can drive just about any truck you throw at him. From huge cranes, cement truck, Farm tractors and the regular “small” sized road truck. He can drive but can he do that well?

name: One Die All Dies: No Zuo No Die
description: Like hard games? Control the hero jump to avoid obstacles by tap on the White area.Help the hero brothers go forward a dashed to the end. How long can you hold? feeling two heroes too easy? Try 3, 4, 5 heroes.

name: Aim Llama
description: Aim llama is all about precision. Ready your sniper and start testing your skills by successfully targeting various objects. Collect coins & use the right cards to complete challenging levels. Become the ultimate sniper and conquer the leaderboard!

name: Fruitito
description: Enter the world of fruity fun where you need to swipe down fruits to fill up your juice bar!

name: Sun Stones
description:
Unlock the magic of Sun Stones to discover a truly unique gaming experience.
Drenched in traditional Hopi sounds and visuals, Sun Stones is a delight for the senses. Use transformation, creation and destruction to solve 100+ original puzzles.

name: Find 2: Block Hit
description:
Break tile and find 2!
Swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number they merge into one. Each new level is more difficult than the previous one.

name: Mole in a Hole
description: Help our hero get back to his hole in this wacky fun filled adventure!

name: Patch Catch
description: You should find 5 differences between 2 pictures before the time runs out! The classic game returns with awesome high quality pics and game center leaderboards! Be quick to get combo points, and show the world who is the master of photo hunting games!!

name: Squishys Revenge
description:
Oh no! Dr. Spudget has stolen all the squishberries. Squishy needs your help to get revenge! Help Squishy get the squishberries back and save all his squishling friends.   
Squishy's Revenge takes classic sliding tile puzzles to new heights! Move the world under Squishy's feet and save the Squishberries!

name: Crash Birds
description: Touch and drag the sling control on the right to power. Aim with the accelerometer than release to fire the bird towards the windmill. Try to collect as many coins as you can and fly the bird safetly through the windmill.

name: Trololo: The Game
description: Choose your character and dance on the Trololo Set or try out the new Conan Set. Straight from the tv show "Conan" on TBS, the Conan Set contains a nice ocean view as well as a "piece of moon rock" which can be moved around as you dance to the "Conan" theme song as one of the three characters. You can also choose whether you want Conan pre or post Beardpocolypse.

name: Crazy Fishing Champion
description: This is a fishing game, 100 clearances with different fishes, dual-mode of life and time, in which you can enjoy the fishing as well as enrich your knowledge on fishes at the same time. The background story of the game is the Gulf's annual world fishing contest, in Hawaii, where the fishing enthusiasts around the world gather, in the hope of competing for the Champion title. In addition to the enjoyment of Bay Resort in Hawaii, the fishing champion could also enjoy a trip of Venice.

name: NBA 2K24: Black Mamba Edition
description:
Grab your squad and experience the past, present, and future of hoops culture in NBA 2K24. Enjoy pure, authentic action and limitless personalized MyPLAYER options in MyCAREER. Collect an impressive array of legends and build your perfect lineup in MyTEAM. Relive your favorite eras as a GM or Commissioner in MyNBA. Experience next-level gameplay and lifelike visuals with your favorite NBA and WNBA teams in PLAY NOW.

Recreate some of Kobe’s most dominant and captivating performances during his rise to global superstardom. Revisit his early career triumphs as a young phenom, and progress through his transcendent journey from elite scorer to one of the greatest players of all time.

name: 30 Sport Games in 1
description:
Ready to win?!
"30 Sport Games in 1" is the ultimate game that brings together 30 different sports in one game!

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Advanced Set 2
description:
This set includes the following DLC:
- Sepith Set 4
- Sepith Set 5
- Sepith Set 6
- Accessories Set 3
- Ingredients Set 3
- High-Grade Medicine Set 3
- Spirit Incense Set 3
- Dragon Incense Set 3
- Zeram Powder Set 3
- Zeram Capsule Set 3
- +More

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Advanced Set 1
description:
This set includes the following DLC:
- Sepith Set 2
- Sepith Set 3
- High-Grade Medicine Set 2
- Accessories Set 2
- Ingredients Set 2
- Spirit Incense Set 2
- Dragon Incense Set 2
- Zeram Powder Set 2
- Zeram Capsule Set 2
- U-Material Set 2
- +More

name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II + Dawn of War II: Chaos Rising
description: Sin descripción

name: Manic Miner Engine
description: Manic Miner game engine, made with Lua, for the Playdate console

name: Backyard Rain Soundscape
description: Nature soundscape audio. Seamless loop for background listening.

name: Red Terror
description: A first person shooter for the play date

name: Radar N Rockets
description: Think you can handle air radar and a rocket launcher at once? Take down as many enemies as possible.

name: Tau
description:
A tubular shooter played entirely with the crank! Avoid obstacles and take fire at enemies while hurtling down a futuristic 360 degree road, turned with the crank.

Includes a 50 stage campaign to blast through, and a daily challenge mode. Chase your own high scores (and those of others!).

name: Pongmatic 2300
description: A recreation of classic Pong machines from the 70s for the Playdate

name: Boat Sim
description:
Blast around in a cool speed boat, go sailing in a fishing boat or be the skipper of a large car ferry!
Boat Sim is a boat simulation you can enjoy anytime!
Enjoy a scenic bay in a virtual speed boat, alongside fishing boats, sailing and other motor boats with lots of scenery and various docks and cities to visit, or take out your fishing boat at night, or try your hand at driving a car ferry between multiple docks!
By design there's no objectives, no score to get, simply relax and enjoy your speed boat, fishing boat and now car ferry.

name: 1948 Dawn of Future
description:
It's 1948 and it's the dawn of a new era.
The two leading super powers started a top secret war to control alien technology found on earth.
Technology that if mastered will give human race a chance against a mysterious alien that threatens our freedom.

name: Yandere AI Girlfriend Simulator: With You Til The End
description: Escape Room game with a Yandere AI girlfriend, who is integrated using ChatGPT.

name: Kraken Odyssey
description: Little kraken in danger! Dive into this 3D action game and avoid dangers. Explore worlds like beaches, jungles, mountains, dungeons. Unlock costumes, be a pirate or unicorn. Love octopuses, beach, adventure? Play Kraken Odyssey!

name: Schlag den Star: Das 3. Spiel
description: Fans of the popular TV show "Schlag den Star" can look forward to a new gaming experience: "Schlag den Star" is back in its third edition. The game promises even more fun, excitement and challenging games for all fans of the format.

name: XeonMass
description:
Control your Angel or Devil to absorb anything smaller than you to grow up.Also, quick slide to burst speed and catch your target easily or run away.
In this high speed war...
How fast you can run?
How many you can eat?
How long you can survive?
Also,
Get Magic items on the battle field to summon meteor showers or a super black hole to defeat enemies. And other players with same country are your alliance to fight together!!

name: Hidden Object: Mystery of Notre Dame de Paris
description: You have never been so scared playing a game in the hidden object genre. In this game you will reveal the secret of the Cathedral of Notre Dame de Paris, as well as investigate a murder. The more you are involved in the game the more you understand that the murder investigation is covered with darkness and mysticism. You must find a killer and unravel the mysteries associated with Notre Dame de Paris.

name: Peppa Pig: The Game
description: Join in Peppa and Georges favourite games and activities. Play as either Peppa or George to complete 11 highly enjoyable games and activities including Car Wash, Kite Flying, Pancake Flipping, Hide and Seek and Colouring-in.

name: Lost Maze
description:
A girl named Misty lived in the maze, but the darkness from deep inside the maze has swallowed all the happiness of memory. The girl is forced to take on an adventure that nothing is sure, only you can lead her the way home!
It's easy to get lost in the maze. Navigate the little girl through a series of challenging puzzles and bring back her home.

name: Puzzle 10
description: Puzzle 10 is extremely addictive “make 10” puzzle game!

name: Loonz
description:
Captured by an evil clown called Eugene, the only way out is to bring down the Circus!
Shoot balloons and release stars, chaining the destruction together to get more points.

name: Spiders in the Bath
description:
Spiders ruining your bath time? Webs clogging up your taps? Silk in your shampoo?
No need to panic - simply practice your spider spraying technique with Spiders in the Bath!

name: Safari Party
description: Sin descripción

name: Ark Saver
description:
Animals come down the line one by one, and you need to rescue them to put them on the ark.
Challenge your brain with this awesome fast-paced puzzle!

name: Gem Defense
description: Build Gem towers and fight off the sneaky dwarves from escaping. Combine Gems to construct secret special Gems and construct mazes to make escaping difficult for the dwarves! Beware the flying bats that fly over your maze!

name: Save the Teenies
description: The aim of the game is simple: to help the very round and very cute Teenies get to a portal so they can go home. But the Teenies will need your help to overcome fire, water, electricity and their endearing tendency to roll the wrong way!

name: MatchX
description: Are you faster than the fastest memory freaks? Prove your speed by playing against the whole world and warding off Alzheimer's at the same time! Make all cards go away by matching them one by one.

name: JAM: Jets Aliens Missiles
description: The Aliens have invaded. Take to the skies and defend the colonies with the most advanced Jets at your fingertips. Battle against waves of enemies and their giant bosses. Upgrade your favourite weapon, or equip a different one for the next mission. Add on special modules to beef up your Jet. Get the highest score multiplier, challenge your friends, and beat others around the world.

name: Pixel Manager: Football 2021
description:
You will take the reins of a fallen giant, on the verge of bankruptcy.
Can you lead it back to former glories, taking it back to the top-tier where it belongs?
The beautiful game, always within arm's reach.

name: Temple Roll
description: Are you up to the ultimate Temple Roll challenge?

name: Shipmatch
description: Shipmatch, the furutistic flight simulator, is here! Fly alone or with friends in a variety of game modes, like racing, dogfighting, and defending the city from an alien mothership invasion.

name: Moonship
description: Journey the cosmic from one solar portal to another. Complete 45 levels of moon bending geometry of fun!
